43#ifndef EPWM_H
44#define EPWM_H
45
46//*****************************************************************************
47//
48// If building with a C++ compiler, make all of the definitions in this header
49// have a C binding.
50//
51//*****************************************************************************
52#ifdef __cplusplus
53extern "C"
54{
55#endif
56
57//*****************************************************************************
58//
61//
62//*****************************************************************************
63
64#include <stdbool.h>
65#include <stdint.h>
66#include "inc/hw_memmap.h"
67#include "inc/hw_types.h"
68#include "inc/hw_epwm.h"
69#include "cpu.h"
70#include "debug.h"
71#include "sysctl.h"
72
73//*****************************************************************************
74//
75// Address offsets from EPWM_BASE to XCMP, MINDB and DE register memory maps
76//
77//*****************************************************************************
78#define EPWM_O_XCMP 0x0400U
79#define EPWM_O_DE 0x0800U
80#define EPWM_O_MINDB 0x0C00U
81
82//*****************************************************************************
83//
84// Defines for the API.
85//
86//*****************************************************************************
87//*****************************************************************************
88//
89// Define to specify mask for source parameter for
90// EPWM_enableSyncOutPulseSource() & EPWM_disableSyncOutPulseSource()
91//
92//*****************************************************************************
93#define EPWM_SYNC_OUT_SOURCE_M ((uint16_t)EPWM_SYNCOUTEN_SWEN |\
94 (uint16_t)EPWM_SYNCOUTEN_ZEROEN |\
95 (uint16_t)EPWM_SYNCOUTEN_CMPBEN |\
96 (uint16_t)EPWM_SYNCOUTEN_CMPCEN |\
97 (uint16_t)EPWM_SYNCOUTEN_CMPDEN |\
98 (uint16_t)EPWM_SYNCOUTEN_DCAEVT1EN |\
99 (uint16_t)EPWM_SYNCOUTEN_DCBEVT1EN)
100
101//*****************************************************************************
102//
103// Values that can be passed to EPWM_enableSyncOutPulseSource() &
104// EPWM_disableSyncOutPulseSource() as the \e mode parameter.
105//
106//*****************************************************************************
108#define EPWM_SYNC_OUT_PULSE_ON_SOFTWARE EPWM_SYNCOUTEN_SWEN
110#define EPWM_SYNC_OUT_PULSE_ON_CNTR_ZERO EPWM_SYNCOUTEN_ZEROEN
112#define EPWM_SYNC_OUT_PULSE_ON_CNTR_COMPARE_B EPWM_SYNCOUTEN_CMPBEN
114#define EPWM_SYNC_OUT_PULSE_ON_CNTR_COMPARE_C EPWM_SYNCOUTEN_CMPCEN
116#define EPWM_SYNC_OUT_PULSE_ON_CNTR_COMPARE_D EPWM_SYNCOUTEN_CMPDEN
118#define EPWM_SYNC_OUT_PULSE_ON_DCA_EVT1_SYNC EPWM_SYNCOUTEN_DCAEVT1EN
120#define EPWM_SYNC_OUT_PULSE_ON_DCB_EVT1_SYNC EPWM_SYNCOUTEN_DCBEVT1EN
122#define EPWM_SYNC_OUT_PULSE_ON_ALL EPWM_SYNC_OUT_SOURCE_M
123
124//
125// Time Base Module
126//
127//*****************************************************************************
128//
131//
132//*****************************************************************************
133typedef enum
134{
136 EPWM_EMULATION_STOP_AFTER_NEXT_TB = 0,
138 EPWM_EMULATION_STOP_AFTER_FULL_CYCLE = 1,
140 EPWM_EMULATION_FREE_RUN = 2
141} EPWM_EmulationMode;
142
143//*****************************************************************************
144//
147//
148//*****************************************************************************
149typedef enum
150{
151 EPWM_COUNT_MODE_DOWN_AFTER_SYNC = 0,
152 EPWM_COUNT_MODE_UP_AFTER_SYNC = 1
153} EPWM_SyncCountMode;
154
155//*****************************************************************************
156//
159//
160//*****************************************************************************
161typedef enum
162{
163 EPWM_CLOCK_DIVIDER_1 = 0,
164 EPWM_CLOCK_DIVIDER_2 = 1,
165 EPWM_CLOCK_DIVIDER_4 = 2,
166 EPWM_CLOCK_DIVIDER_8 = 3,
167 EPWM_CLOCK_DIVIDER_16 = 4,
168 EPWM_CLOCK_DIVIDER_32 = 5,
169 EPWM_CLOCK_DIVIDER_64 = 6,
170 EPWM_CLOCK_DIVIDER_128 = 7
171} EPWM_ClockDivider;
172
173//*****************************************************************************
174//
177//
178//*****************************************************************************
179typedef enum
180{
181 EPWM_HSCLOCK_DIVIDER_1 = 0,
182 EPWM_HSCLOCK_DIVIDER_2 = 1,
183 EPWM_HSCLOCK_DIVIDER_4 = 2,
184 EPWM_HSCLOCK_DIVIDER_6 = 3,
185 EPWM_HSCLOCK_DIVIDER_8 = 4,
186 EPWM_HSCLOCK_DIVIDER_10 = 5,
187 EPWM_HSCLOCK_DIVIDER_12 = 6,
188 EPWM_HSCLOCK_DIVIDER_14 = 7
189} EPWM_HSClockDivider;

192//*****************************************************************************
193//
196//
197//*****************************************************************************
198typedef enum
199{
201 EPWM_SYNC_IN_PULSE_SRC_DISABLE = 0x0,
203 EPWM_SYNC_IN_PULSE_SRC_SYNCOUT_EPWM1 = 0x1,
205 EPWM_SYNC_IN_PULSE_SRC_SYNCOUT_EPWM2 = 0x2,
207 EPWM_SYNC_IN_PULSE_SRC_SYNCOUT_EPWM3 = 0x3,
209 EPWM_SYNC_IN_PULSE_SRC_SYNCOUT_EPWM4 = 0x4,
211 EPWM_SYNC_IN_PULSE_SRC_SYNCOUT_EPWM5 = 0x5,
213 EPWM_SYNC_IN_PULSE_SRC_SYNCOUT_EPWM6 = 0x6,
215 EPWM_SYNC_IN_PULSE_SRC_SYNCOUT_EPWM7 = 0x7,
217 EPWM_SYNC_IN_PULSE_SRC_SYNCOUT_EPWM8 = 0x8,
219 EPWM_SYNC_IN_PULSE_SRC_SYNCOUT_EPWM9 = 0x9,
221 EPWM_SYNC_IN_PULSE_SRC_SYNCOUT_EPWM10 = 0xA,
223 EPWM_SYNC_IN_PULSE_SRC_SYNCOUT_EPWM11 = 0xB,
225 EPWM_SYNC_IN_PULSE_SRC_SYNCOUT_EPWM12 = 0xC,
227 EPWM_SYNC_IN_PULSE_SRC_SYNCOUT_EPWM13 = 0xD,
229 EPWM_SYNC_IN_PULSE_SRC_SYNCOUT_EPWM14 = 0xE,
231 EPWM_SYNC_IN_PULSE_SRC_SYNCOUT_EPWM15 = 0xF,
233 EPWM_SYNC_IN_PULSE_SRC_SYNCOUT_EPWM16 = 0x10,
235 EPWM_SYNC_IN_PULSE_SRC_SYNCOUT_ECAP1 = 0x11,
237 EPWM_SYNC_IN_PULSE_SRC_SYNCOUT_ECAP2 = 0x12,
239 EPWM_SYNC_IN_PULSE_SRC_SYNCOUT_ECAP3 = 0x13,
241 EPWM_SYNC_IN_PULSE_SRC_SYNCOUT_ECAP4 = 0x14,
243 EPWM_SYNC_IN_PULSE_SRC_SYNCOUT_ECAP5 = 0x15,
245 EPWM_SYNC_IN_PULSE_SRC_SYNCOUT_ECAP6 = 0x16,
247 EPWM_SYNC_IN_PULSE_SRC_SYNCOUT_ECAP7 = 0x17,
249 EPWM_SYNC_IN_PULSE_SRC_INPUTXBAR_OUT5 = 0x18,
251 EPWM_SYNC_IN_PULSE_SRC_INPUTXBAR_OUT6 = 0x19,
253 EPWM_SYNC_IN_PULSE_SRC_ETHERCAT_SYNC0 = 0x1A,
255 EPWM_SYNC_IN_PULSE_SRC_ETHERCAT_SYNC1 = 0x1B,
257 EPWM_SYNC_IN_PULSE_SRC_SYNCOUT_EPWM17 = 0x1C,
259 EPWM_SYNC_IN_PULSE_SRC_SYNCOUT_EPWM18 = 0x1D,
261 EPWM_SYNC_IN_PULSE_SRC_FSIRXA_TRIG1 = 0x1E,
263 EPWM_SYNC_IN_PULSE_SRC_FSIRXB_TRIG1 = 0x1F,
265 EPWM_SYNC_IN_PULSE_SRC_FSIRXC_TRIG1 = 0x20,
267 EPWM_SYNC_IN_PULSE_SRC_FSIRXD_TRIG1 = 0x21,
268} EPWM_SyncInPulseSource;

305 EPWM_COUNTER_MODE_DOWN = 1,
306 EPWM_COUNTER_MODE_UP_DOWN = 2,
307 EPWM_COUNTER_MODE_STOP_FREEZE = 3
308} EPWM_TimeBaseCountMode;

322 EPWM_SHADOW_LOAD_MODE_COUNTER_SYNC = 1,
324 EPWM_SHADOW_LOAD_MODE_SYNC = 2
325} EPWM_PeriodShadowLoadMode;

373 EPWM_COMP_LOAD_FREEZE = 3,

501//*****************************************************************************
502//
505//
506//*****************************************************************************
507typedef enum
508{
510 EPWM_AQ_OUTPUT_NO_CHANGE_ZERO = 0x0,
512 EPWM_AQ_OUTPUT_LOW_ZERO = 0x1,
514 EPWM_AQ_OUTPUT_HIGH_ZERO = 0x2,
516 EPWM_AQ_OUTPUT_TOGGLE_ZERO = 0x3,
518 EPWM_AQ_OUTPUT_NO_CHANGE_PERIOD = 0x0,
520 EPWM_AQ_OUTPUT_LOW_PERIOD = 0x4,
522 EPWM_AQ_OUTPUT_HIGH_PERIOD = 0x8,
524 EPWM_AQ_OUTPUT_TOGGLE_PERIOD = 0xC,
526 EPWM_AQ_OUTPUT_NO_CHANGE_UP_CMPA = 0x00,
528 EPWM_AQ_OUTPUT_LOW_UP_CMPA = 0x10,
530 EPWM_AQ_OUTPUT_HIGH_UP_CMPA = 0x20,
532 EPWM_AQ_OUTPUT_TOGGLE_UP_CMPA = 0x30,
534 EPWM_AQ_OUTPUT_NO_CHANGE_DOWN_CMPA = 0x00,
536 EPWM_AQ_OUTPUT_LOW_DOWN_CMPA = 0x40,
538 EPWM_AQ_OUTPUT_HIGH_DOWN_CMPA = 0x80,
540 EPWM_AQ_OUTPUT_TOGGLE_DOWN_CMPA = 0xC0,
542 EPWM_AQ_OUTPUT_NO_CHANGE_UP_CMPB = 0x000,
544 EPWM_AQ_OUTPUT_LOW_UP_CMPB = 0x100,
546 EPWM_AQ_OUTPUT_HIGH_UP_CMPB = 0x200,
548 EPWM_AQ_OUTPUT_TOGGLE_UP_CMPB = 0x300,
550 EPWM_AQ_OUTPUT_NO_CHANGE_DOWN_CMPB = 0x000,
552 EPWM_AQ_OUTPUT_LOW_DOWN_CMPB = 0x400,
554 EPWM_AQ_OUTPUT_HIGH_DOWN_CMPB = 0x800,
556 EPWM_AQ_OUTPUT_TOGGLE_DOWN_CMPB = 0xC00
557} EPWM_ActionQualifierEventAction;
558

566typedef enum

571 EPWM_AQ_OUTPUT_LOW_UP_T1 = 0x1,
573 EPWM_AQ_OUTPUT_HIGH_UP_T1 = 0x2,
575 EPWM_AQ_OUTPUT_TOGGLE_UP_T1 = 0x3,
577 EPWM_AQ_OUTPUT_NO_CHANGE_DOWN_T1 = 0x0,
579 EPWM_AQ_OUTPUT_LOW_DOWN_T1 = 0x4,
581 EPWM_AQ_OUTPUT_HIGH_DOWN_T1 = 0x8,
583 EPWM_AQ_OUTPUT_TOGGLE_DOWN_T1 = 0xC,
585 EPWM_AQ_OUTPUT_NO_CHANGE_UP_T2 = 0x00,
587 EPWM_AQ_OUTPUT_LOW_UP_T2 = 0x10,
589 EPWM_AQ_OUTPUT_HIGH_UP_T2 = 0x20,
591 EPWM_AQ_OUTPUT_TOGGLE_UP_T2 = 0x30,
593 EPWM_AQ_OUTPUT_NO_CHANGE_DOWN_T2 = 0x00,

672// EPWM_setFallingEdgeDeadBandDelayInput() as the input parameter.
673//

680#define EPWM_DB_INPUT_EPWMB 1U
683#define EPWM_DB_INPUT_DB_RED 2U
684

689//

752
753//
754// Trip Zone
755//
756//*****************************************************************************
757//
758// Values that can be passed to EPWM_enableTripZoneSignals() and
759// EPWM_disableTripZoneSignals() as the tzSignal parameter.
760//
761//*****************************************************************************
764#define EPWM_TZ_SIGNAL_CBC1 0x1U
767#define EPWM_TZ_SIGNAL_CBC2 0x2U
770#define EPWM_TZ_SIGNAL_CBC3 0x4U
773#define EPWM_TZ_SIGNAL_CBC4 0x8U
776#define EPWM_TZ_SIGNAL_CBC5 0x10U
779#define EPWM_TZ_SIGNAL_CBC6 0x20U
782#define EPWM_TZ_SIGNAL_DCAEVT2 0x40U
785#define EPWM_TZ_SIGNAL_DCBEVT2 0x80U
788#define EPWM_TZ_SIGNAL_OSHT1 0x100U
791#define EPWM_TZ_SIGNAL_OSHT2 0x200U
794#define EPWM_TZ_SIGNAL_OSHT3 0x400U
797#define EPWM_TZ_SIGNAL_OSHT4 0x800U
800#define EPWM_TZ_SIGNAL_OSHT5 0x1000U
803#define EPWM_TZ_SIGNAL_OSHT6 0x2000U
806#define EPWM_TZ_SIGNAL_DCAEVT1 0x4000U
809#define EPWM_TZ_SIGNAL_DCBEVT1 0x8000U
810
811//*****************************************************************************
812//
813// Values that can be passed to EPWM_enableTripZone2Signals() and
814// EPWM_disableTripZone2Signals() as the tzSignal parameter.
815//
816//*****************************************************************************
818#define EPWM_TZ_SIGNAL_CAPEVT_CBC (0x1U)
820#define EPWM_TZ_SIGNAL_CAPEVT_OST (0x100U)
821
822//*****************************************************************************
823//
826//
827//*****************************************************************************
828typedef enum
829{
830 EPWM_TZ_DC_OUTPUT_A1 = 0,
831 EPWM_TZ_DC_OUTPUT_A2 = 3,
832 EPWM_TZ_DC_OUTPUT_B1 = 6,
833 EPWM_TZ_DC_OUTPUT_B2 = 9
834} EPWM_TripZoneDigitalCompareOutput;
835
836//*****************************************************************************
837//
840//
841//*****************************************************************************
842typedef enum
843{
844 EPWM_TZ_EVENT_DC_DISABLED = 0,
845 EPWM_TZ_EVENT_DCXH_LOW = 1,
846 EPWM_TZ_EVENT_DCXH_HIGH = 2,
847 EPWM_TZ_EVENT_DCXL_LOW = 3,
848 EPWM_TZ_EVENT_DCXL_HIGH = 4,
849 EPWM_TZ_EVENT_DCXL_HIGH_DCXH_LOW = 5
850} EPWM_TripZoneDigitalCompareOutputEvent;
851
852//*****************************************************************************
853//
856//
857//*****************************************************************************
858typedef enum
859{
860 EPWM_TZ_ACTION_EVENT_TZA = 0,
861 EPWM_TZ_ACTION_EVENT_TZB = 2,
862 EPWM_TZ_ACTION_EVENT_DCAEVT1 = 4,
863 EPWM_TZ_ACTION_EVENT_DCAEVT2 = 6,
864 EPWM_TZ_ACTION_EVENT_DCBEVT1 = 8,
865 EPWM_TZ_ACTION_EVENT_DCBEVT2 = 10
866} EPWM_TripZoneEvent;

878 EPWM_TZ_ACTION_LOW = 2,
879 EPWM_TZ_ACTION_DISABLE = 3
880} EPWM_TripZoneAction;
881
882//*****************************************************************************
883//
886//
887//*****************************************************************************
888typedef enum
889{

893 EPWM_TZ_ADV_ACTION_EVENT_TZB_U = 6,
895 EPWM_TZ_ADV_ACTION_EVENT_TZA_D = 3,
897 EPWM_TZ_ADV_ACTION_EVENT_TZA_U = 0
898} EPWM_TripZoneAdvancedEvent;
899
900//*****************************************************************************
901//
905//
906//*****************************************************************************
907typedef enum
908{
909 EPWM_TZ_ADV_ACTION_HIGH_Z = 0,
910 EPWM_TZ_ADV_ACTION_HIGH = 1,
911 EPWM_TZ_ADV_ACTION_LOW = 2,
912 EPWM_TZ_ADV_ACTION_TOGGLE = 3,
913 EPWM_TZ_ADV_ACTION_DISABLE = 7
914} EPWM_TripZoneAdvancedAction;
915

1619//*****************************************************************************
1620//
1621// Values that can be passed to EPWM_enableTripZoneInterrupt()and
1622// EPWM_disableTripZoneInterrupt() as the tzInterrupt parameter .
1623//
1624//*****************************************************************************
1627#define EPWM_TZ_INTERRUPT_CBC 0x2U
1630#define EPWM_TZ_INTERRUPT_OST 0x4U
1633#define EPWM_TZ_INTERRUPT_DCAEVT1 0x8U
1636#define EPWM_TZ_INTERRUPT_DCAEVT2 0x10U
1639#define EPWM_TZ_INTERRUPT_DCBEVT1 0x20U
1642#define EPWM_TZ_INTERRUPT_DCBEVT2 0x40U
1645#define EPWM_TZ_INTERRUPT_CAPEVT 0x80U
1646
1647//*****************************************************************************
1648//
1649// Values that can be returned by EPWM_getTripZoneFlagStatus() .
1650//
1651//*****************************************************************************
1654#define EPWM_TZ_FLAG_CBC 0x2U
1657#define EPWM_TZ_FLAG_OST 0x4U
1660#define EPWM_TZ_FLAG_DCAEVT1 0x8U
1663#define EPWM_TZ_FLAG_DCAEVT2 0x10U
1666#define EPWM_TZ_FLAG_DCBEVT1 0x20U
1669#define EPWM_TZ_FLAG_DCBEVT2 0x40U
1672#define EPWM_TZ_FLAG_CAPEVT 0x80U
1673
1674//*****************************************************************************
1675//
1676// Value can be passed to EPWM_clearTripZoneFlag() as the
1677// tzInterrupt parameter and returned by EPWM_getTripZoneFlagStatus().
1678//
1679//*****************************************************************************
1682#define EPWM_TZ_INTERRUPT 0x1U
1683

1705#define EPWM_TZ_CBC_FLAG_5 0x10U
1708#define EPWM_TZ_CBC_FLAG_6 0x20U

1714#define EPWM_TZ_CBC_FLAG_DCBEVT2 0x80U
1717#define EPWM_TZ_CBC_FLAG_CAPEVT 0x100U

1737#define EPWM_TZ_OST_FLAG_OST4 0x8U

1743#define EPWM_TZ_OST_FLAG_OST6 0x20U

1752#define EPWM_TZ_OST_FLAG_CAPEVT 0x100U

1759//*****************************************************************************

1772// Values that can be passed to EPWM_forceTripZoneEvent() as the
1773// tzForceEvent parameter.
1774//
1775//*****************************************************************************

1781#define EPWM_TZ_FORCE_EVENT_OST 0x4U
1784#define EPWM_TZ_FORCE_EVENT_DCAEVT1 0x8U
1787#define EPWM_TZ_FORCE_EVENT_DCAEVT2 0x10U
1790#define EPWM_TZ_FORCE_EVENT_DCBEVT1 0x20U
1793#define EPWM_TZ_FORCE_EVENT_DCBEVT2 0x40U
1796#define EPWM_TZ_FORCE_EVENT_CAPEVT 0x80U
1797

1802//

1804typedef enum
1805{

1818 EPWM_TZ_TRIPOUT_CAPEVT = 12U

2420//*****************************************************************************
2421//
2424//
2425//*****************************************************************************
2426typedef struct
2427{
2428 float32_t freqInHz;
2429 float32_t dutyValA;
2430 float32_t dutyValB;
2431 bool invertSignalB;
2432 float32_t sysClkInHz;
2433 SysCtl_EPWMClkDivider epwmClkDiv;
2434 EPWM_TimeBaseCountMode tbCtrMode;
2435 EPWM_ClockDivider tbClkDiv;
2436 EPWM_HSClockDivider tbHSClkDiv;
2437} EPWM_SignalParams;
2438
2439//*****************************************************************************
2440//
2441// Functions APIs shared with HRPWM module
2442//
2443//*****************************************************************************
2444
2445//
2446// Period Control related API
2447//
2448#define EPWM_setSyncPulseSource HRPWM_setSyncPulseSource
2449
2450//*****************************************************************************
2451//
2452// Prototypes for the API.
2453//
2454//*****************************************************************************
2455
2456//*****************************************************************************
2457//
2467//
2468//*****************************************************************************
2469#ifdef DEBUG
2470static inline bool EPWM_isBaseValid(uint32_t base)
2471{
2472 return(
2473 ((base & BASE_ADDR_MASK) == EPWM1_BASE_FRAME(0U)) ||
2474 ((base & BASE_ADDR_MASK) == EPWM2_BASE_FRAME(0U)) ||
2475 ((base & BASE_ADDR_MASK) == EPWM3_BASE_FRAME(0U)) ||
2476 ((base & BASE_ADDR_MASK) == EPWM4_BASE_FRAME(0U)) ||
2477 ((base & BASE_ADDR_MASK) == EPWM5_BASE_FRAME(0U)) ||
2478 ((base & BASE_ADDR_MASK) == EPWM6_BASE_FRAME(0U)) ||
2479 ((base & BASE_ADDR_MASK) == EPWM7_BASE_FRAME(0U)) ||
2480 ((base & BASE_ADDR_MASK) == EPWM8_BASE_FRAME(0U)) ||
2481 ((base & BASE_ADDR_MASK) == EPWM9_BASE_FRAME(0U)) ||
2482 ((base & BASE_ADDR_MASK) == EPWM10_BASE_FRAME(0U)) ||
2483 ((base & BASE_ADDR_MASK) == EPWM11_BASE_FRAME(0U)) ||
2484 ((base & BASE_ADDR_MASK) == EPWM12_BASE_FRAME(0U)) ||
2485 ((base & BASE_ADDR_MASK) == EPWM13_BASE_FRAME(0U)) ||
2486 ((base & BASE_ADDR_MASK) == EPWM14_BASE_FRAME(0U)) ||
2487 ((base & BASE_ADDR_MASK) == EPWM15_BASE_FRAME(0U)) ||
2488 ((base & BASE_ADDR_MASK) == EPWM16_BASE_FRAME(0U)) ||
2489 ((base & BASE_ADDR_MASK) == EPWM17_BASE_FRAME(0U)) ||
2490 ((base & BASE_ADDR_MASK) == EPWM18_BASE_FRAME(0U))
2491 ||
2492
2493 ((base & BASE_ADDR_MASK) == EPWM1XLINK_BASE_FRAME(0U)) ||
2494 ((base & BASE_ADDR_MASK) == EPWM2XLINK_BASE_FRAME(0U)) ||
2495 ((base & BASE_ADDR_MASK) == EPWM3XLINK_BASE_FRAME(0U)) ||
2496 ((base & BASE_ADDR_MASK) == EPWM4XLINK_BASE_FRAME(0U)) ||
2497 ((base & BASE_ADDR_MASK) == EPWM5XLINK_BASE_FRAME(0U)) ||
2498 ((base & BASE_ADDR_MASK) == EPWM6XLINK_BASE_FRAME(0U)) ||
2499 ((base & BASE_ADDR_MASK) == EPWM7XLINK_BASE_FRAME(0U)) ||
2500 ((base & BASE_ADDR_MASK) == EPWM8XLINK_BASE_FRAME(0U)) ||
2501 ((base & BASE_ADDR_MASK) == EPWM9XLINK_BASE_FRAME(0U)) ||
2502 ((base & BASE_ADDR_MASK) == EPWM10XLINK_BASE_FRAME(0U)) ||
2503 ((base & BASE_ADDR_MASK) == EPWM11XLINK_BASE_FRAME(0U)) ||
2504 ((base & BASE_ADDR_MASK) == EPWM12XLINK_BASE_FRAME(0U)) ||
2505 ((base & BASE_ADDR_MASK) == EPWM13XLINK_BASE_FRAME(0U)) ||
2506 ((base & BASE_ADDR_MASK) == EPWM14XLINK_BASE_FRAME(0U)) ||
2507 ((base & BASE_ADDR_MASK) == EPWM15XLINK_BASE_FRAME(0U)) ||
2508 ((base & BASE_ADDR_MASK) == EPWM16XLINK_BASE_FRAME(0U)) ||
2509 ((base & BASE_ADDR_MASK) == EPWM17XLINK_BASE_FRAME(0U)) ||
2510 ((base & BASE_ADDR_MASK) == EPWM18XLINK_BASE_FRAME(0U))
2511
2512 );
2513
2514}
2515#endif
2516
2517//
2518// Time Base Sub Module related APIs
2519//
2520//*****************************************************************************
2521//
2530//
2531//*****************************************************************************
2532static inline void
2533EPWM_setTimeBaseCounter(uint32_t base, uint16_t count)
2534{
2535 //
2536 // Check the arguments
2537 //
2538 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
2539
2540 //
2541 // Write to TBCTR register
2542 //
2543 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TBCTR) = count;
2544}
2545
2546//*****************************************************************************
2547//
2560//
2561//*****************************************************************************
2562static inline void
2563EPWM_setCountModeAfterSync(uint32_t base, EPWM_SyncCountMode mode)
2564{
2565 //
2566 // Check the arguments
2567 //
2568 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
2569
2570 if(mode == EPWM_COUNT_MODE_UP_AFTER_SYNC)
2571 {
2572 //
2573 // Set PHSDIR bit
2574 //
2575 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TBCTL) |= EPWM_TBCTL_PHSDIR;
2576 }
2577 else
2578 {
2579 //
2580 // Clear PHSDIR bit
2581 //
2582 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TBCTL) &= ~EPWM_TBCTL_PHSDIR;
2583 }
2584}
2585
2586//*****************************************************************************
2587//
2607//
2608//*****************************************************************************
2609static inline void
2610EPWM_setClockPrescaler(uint32_t base, EPWM_ClockDivider prescaler,
2611 EPWM_HSClockDivider highSpeedPrescaler)
2612{
2613 //
2614 // Check the arguments
2615 //
2616 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
2617
2618 //
2619 // Write to CLKDIV and HSPCLKDIV bit
2620 //
2621 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TBCTL) =
2622 ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TBCTL) &
2623 ~(EPWM_TBCTL_CLKDIV_M | EPWM_TBCTL_HSPCLKDIV_M)) |
2624 (((uint16_t)prescaler << EPWM_TBCTL_CLKDIV_S) |
2625 ((uint16_t)highSpeedPrescaler << EPWM_TBCTL_HSPCLKDIV_S)));
2626} // convert to uint_8?
2627
2628//*****************************************************************************
2629//
2639//
2640//*****************************************************************************
2641static inline void
2642EPWM_forceSyncPulse(uint32_t base)
2643{
2644 //
2645 // Check the arguments
2646 //
2647 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
2648
2649 //
2650 // Set SWFSYNC bit
2651 //
2652 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TBCTL) |= EPWM_TBCTL_SWFSYNC;
2653}
2654
2655//*****************************************************************************
2656//
2680//
2681//*****************************************************************************
2682static inline void
2683EPWM_setSyncInPulseSource(uint32_t base, EPWM_SyncInPulseSource source)
2684{
2685 //
2686 // Check the arguments
2687 //
2688 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
2689
2690 //
2691 // Set EPWM Sync-In Source Mode.
2692 //
2693 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_SYNCINSEL) =
2694 (HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_SYNCINSEL) & (~EPWM_SYNCINSEL_SEL_M)) |
2695 ((uint16_t)source & EPWM_SYNCINSEL_SEL_M);
2696
2697}
2698//*****************************************************************************
2699//
2731//
2732//*****************************************************************************
2733static inline void
2734EPWM_enableSyncOutPulseSource(uint32_t base, uint16_t source)
2735{
2736 //
2737 // Check the arguments
2738 //
2739 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
2740 ASSERT(source <= EPWM_SYNC_OUT_SOURCE_M);
2741
2742 //
2743 // Enable selected EPWM Sync-Out Sources.
2744 //
2745 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_SYNCOUTEN) = HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_SYNCOUTEN) |
2746 (uint16_t)source;
2747
2748}
2749
2750//*****************************************************************************
2751//
2777//
2778//*****************************************************************************
2779static inline void
2780EPWM_disableSyncOutPulseSource(uint32_t base, uint16_t source)
2781{
2782 //
2783 // Check the arguments
2784 //
2785 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
2786 ASSERT(source <= EPWM_SYNC_OUT_SOURCE_M);
2787
2788 //
2789 // Disable EPWM Sync-Out Sources.
2790 //
2791 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_SYNCOUTEN) = HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_SYNCOUTEN) &
2792 ~((uint16_t)source);
2793
2794}
2795//*****************************************************************************
2796//
2810//
2811//*****************************************************************************
2812static inline void
2813EPWM_setOneShotSyncOutTrigger(uint32_t base,
2814 EPWM_OneShotSyncOutTrigger trigger)
2815{
2816 //
2817 // Check the arguments
2818 //
2819 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
2820
2821 //
2822 // Set source for One-Shot Sync-Out Pulse.
2823 //
2824 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TBCTL3) =
2825 (HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TBCTL3) & ~(EPWM_TBCTL3_OSSFRCEN)) |
2826 (uint16_t)trigger;
2827}
2828
2829//*****************************************************************************
2830//
2843//
2844//*****************************************************************************
2845static inline void
2846EPWM_setPeriodLoadMode(uint32_t base, EPWM_PeriodLoadMode loadMode)
2847{
2848 //
2849 // Check the arguments
2850 //
2851 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
2852
2853 if(loadMode == EPWM_PERIOD_SHADOW_LOAD)
2854 {
2855 //
2856 // Clear PRDLD
2857 //
2858 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TBCTL) &= ~EPWM_TBCTL_PRDLD;
2859 }
2860 else
2861 {
2862 //
2863 // Set PRDLD
2864 //
2865 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TBCTL) |= EPWM_TBCTL_PRDLD;
2866 }
2867}
2868//*****************************************************************************
2869//
2878//
2879//*****************************************************************************
2880static inline void
2881EPWM_enablePhaseShiftLoad(uint32_t base)
2882{
2883 //
2884 // Check the arguments
2885 //
2886 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
2887
2888 //
2889 // Set PHSEN bit
2890 //
2891 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TBCTL) |= EPWM_TBCTL_PHSEN;
2892}
2893//*****************************************************************************
2894//
2902//
2903//*****************************************************************************
2904static inline void
2905EPWM_disablePhaseShiftLoad(uint32_t base)
2906{
2907 //
2908 // Check the arguments
2909 //
2910 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
2911
2912 //
2913 // Clear PHSEN bit
2914 //
2915 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TBCTL) &= ~EPWM_TBCTL_PHSEN;
2916}
2917//*****************************************************************************
2918//
2932//
2933//*****************************************************************************
2934static inline void
2935EPWM_setTimeBaseCounterMode(uint32_t base, EPWM_TimeBaseCountMode counterMode)
2936{
2937 //
2938 // Check the arguments
2939 //
2940 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
2941
2942 //
2943 // Write to CTRMODE bit
2944 //
2945 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TBCTL) =
2946 ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TBCTL) & ~(EPWM_TBCTL_CTRMODE_M)) |
2947 ((uint16_t)counterMode));
2948}
2949//*****************************************************************************
2950//
2967//
2968//*****************************************************************************
2969static inline void
2970EPWM_selectPeriodLoadEvent(uint32_t base,
2971 EPWM_PeriodShadowLoadMode shadowLoadMode)
2972{
2973 //
2974 // Check the arguments
2975 //
2976 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
2977
2978 //
2979 // Write to PRDLDSYNC bit
2980 //
2981 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TBCTL2) =
2982 ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TBCTL2) & ~(EPWM_TBCTL2_PRDLDSYNC_M)) |
2983 ((uint16_t)shadowLoadMode << EPWM_TBCTL2_PRDLDSYNC_S));
2984}
2985//*****************************************************************************
2986//
2994//
2995//*****************************************************************************
2996static inline void
2997EPWM_enableOneShotSync(uint32_t base)
2998{
2999 //
3000 // Check the arguments
3001 //
3002 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
3003
3004 //
3005 // Set OSHTSYNCMODE bit
3006 //
3007 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TBCTL2) |= EPWM_TBCTL2_OSHTSYNCMODE;
3008}
3009//*****************************************************************************
3010//
3018//
3019//*****************************************************************************
3020static inline void
3021EPWM_disableOneShotSync(uint32_t base)
3022{
3023 //
3024 // Check the arguments
3025 //
3026 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
3027
3028 //
3029 // Clear OSHTSYNCMODE bit
3030 //
3031 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TBCTL2) &= ~EPWM_TBCTL2_OSHTSYNCMODE;
3032}
3033//*****************************************************************************
3034//
3042//
3043//*****************************************************************************
3044static inline void
3045EPWM_startOneShotSync(uint32_t base)
3046{
3047 //
3048 // Check the arguments
3049 //
3050 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
3051
3052 //
3053 // Set OSHTSYNC bit
3054 //
3055 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TBCTL2) |= EPWM_TBCTL2_OSHTSYNC;
3056}
3057//*****************************************************************************
3058//
3066//
3067//*****************************************************************************
3068static inline uint16_t
3069EPWM_getTimeBaseCounterValue(uint32_t base)
3070{
3071 //
3072 // Check the arguments
3073 //
3074 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
3075
3076 //
3077 // Returns TBCTR value
3078 //
3079 return(HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TBCTR));
3080}
3081//*****************************************************************************
3082//
3091//
3092//*****************************************************************************
3093static inline bool
3094EPWM_getTimeBaseCounterOverflowStatus(uint32_t base)
3095{
3096 //
3097 // Check the arguments
3098 //
3099 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
3100
3101 //
3102 // Return true if CTRMAX bit is set, false otherwise
3103 //
3104 return(((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TBSTS) & EPWM_TBSTS_CTRMAX) ==
3105 EPWM_TBSTS_CTRMAX));
3106}
3107//*****************************************************************************
3108//
3117//
3118//*****************************************************************************
3119static inline void
3120EPWM_clearTimeBaseCounterOverflowEvent(uint32_t base)
3121{
3122 //
3123 // Check the arguments
3124 //
3125 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
3126
3127 //
3128 // Set CTRMAX bit
3129 //
3130 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TBSTS) = EPWM_TBSTS_CTRMAX;
3131}
3132//*****************************************************************************
3133//
3142//
3143//*****************************************************************************
3144static inline bool
3145EPWM_getSyncStatus(uint32_t base)
3146{
3147 //
3148 // Check the arguments
3149 //
3150 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
3151
3152 //
3153 // Return true if SYNCI bit is set, false otherwise
3154 //
3155 return(((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TBSTS) & EPWM_TBSTS_SYNCI) ==
3156 EPWM_TBSTS_SYNCI));
3157}
3158//*****************************************************************************
3159//
3167//
3168//*****************************************************************************
3169static inline void
3170EPWM_clearSyncEvent(uint32_t base)
3171{
3172 //
3173 // Check the arguments
3174 //
3175 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
3176
3177 //
3178 // Set SYNCI bit
3179 //
3180 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TBSTS) = EPWM_TBSTS_SYNCI;
3181}
3182//*****************************************************************************
3183//
3193//
3194//*****************************************************************************
3195static inline uint16_t
3196EPWM_getTimeBaseCounterDirection(uint32_t base)
3197{
3198 //
3199 // Check the arguments
3200 //
3201 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
3202
3203 //
3204 // Return CTRDIR bit
3205 //
3206 return(HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TBSTS) & EPWM_TBSTS_CTRDIR);
3207}
3208//*****************************************************************************
3209//
3221//
3222//*****************************************************************************
3223
3224static inline void
3225EPWM_setPhaseShift(uint32_t base, uint16_t phaseCount)
3226{
3227 //
3228 // Check the arguments
3229 //
3230 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
3231
3232 //
3233 // Write to TBPHS bit
3234 //
3235 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TBPHS + 0x2U) = phaseCount;
3236
3237}
3238//*****************************************************************************
3239//
3253//
3254//*****************************************************************************
3255static inline void
3256EPWM_setTimeBasePeriod(uint32_t base, uint16_t periodCount)
3257{
3258 //
3259 // Check the arguments
3260 //
3261 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
3262
3263 //
3264 // Write to TBPRD bit
3265 //
3266 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TBPRD) = periodCount;
3267}
3268//*****************************************************************************
3269//
3277//
3278//*****************************************************************************
3279static inline uint16_t
3280EPWM_getTimeBasePeriod(uint32_t base)
3281{
3282 //
3283 // Check the arguments
3284 //
3285 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
3286
3287 //
3288 // Read from TBPRD bit
3289 //
3290 return(HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TBPRD));
3291}
3292
3293//*****************************************************************************
3294//
3321//
3322//*****************************************************************************
3323static inline void
3324EPWM_setCounterCompareShadowLoadMode(uint32_t base,
3325 EPWM_CounterCompareModule compModule,
3326 EPWM_CounterCompareLoadMode loadMode)
3327{
3328 uint16_t syncModeOffset;
3329 uint16_t loadModeOffset;
3330 uint16_t shadowModeOffset;
3331 uint32_t registerOffset;
3332
3333 //
3334 // Check the arguments
3335 //
3336 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
3337
3338 if((compModule == EPWM_COUNTER_COMPARE_A) ||
3339 (compModule == EPWM_COUNTER_COMPARE_C))
3340 {
3341 syncModeOffset = 10U;
3342 loadModeOffset = 0U;
3343 shadowModeOffset = 4U;
3344 }
3345 else
3346 {
3347 syncModeOffset = 12U;
3348 loadModeOffset = 2U;
3349 shadowModeOffset = 6U;
3350 }
3351
3352 //
3353 // Get the register offset. EPWM_O_CMPCTL for A&B or
3354 // EPWM_O_CMPCTL2 for C&D
3355 //
3356 registerOffset = base + EPWM_O_CMPCTL + ((uint32_t)compModule & 0x1U) * 2U;
3357
3358 //
3359 // Set the appropriate sync and load mode bits and also enable shadow
3360 // load mode. Shadow to active load can also be frozen.
3361 //
3362 HWREGH(registerOffset) = ((HWREGH(registerOffset) &
3363 ~((0x3U << syncModeOffset) | // Clear sync mode
3364 (0x3U << loadModeOffset) | // Clear load mode
3365 (0x1U << shadowModeOffset))) | // shadow mode
3366 ((((uint16_t)loadMode >> 2U) << syncModeOffset) |
3367 (((uint16_t)loadMode & 0x3U) << loadModeOffset)));
3368}
3369//*****************************************************************************
3370//
3385//
3386//*****************************************************************************
3387static inline void
3388EPWM_disableCounterCompareShadowLoadMode(uint32_t base,
3389 EPWM_CounterCompareModule compModule)
3390{
3391 uint16_t shadowModeOffset;
3392 uint32_t registerOffset;
3393
3394 //
3395 // Check the arguments
3396 //
3397 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
3398
3399 if((compModule == EPWM_COUNTER_COMPARE_A) ||
3400 (compModule == EPWM_COUNTER_COMPARE_C))
3401 {
3402 shadowModeOffset = 4U;
3403 }
3404 else
3405 {
3406 shadowModeOffset = 6U;
3407 }
3408
3409 //
3410 // Get the register offset. EPWM_O_CMPCTL for A&B or
3411 // EPWM_O_CMPCTL2 for C&D
3412 //
3413 registerOffset = base + EPWM_O_CMPCTL + ((uint32_t)compModule & 0x1U) * 2U;
3414
3415 //
3416 // Disable shadow load mode.
3417 //
3418 HWREGH(registerOffset) = (HWREGH(registerOffset) |
3419 (0x1U << shadowModeOffset));
3420}
3421//*****************************************************************************
3422//
3438//
3439//*****************************************************************************
3440static inline void
3441EPWM_setCounterCompareValue(uint32_t base, EPWM_CounterCompareModule compModule,
3442 uint16_t compCount)
3443{
3444 uint32_t registerOffset;
3445
3446 //
3447 // Check the arguments
3448 //
3449 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
3450
3451 //
3452 // Get the register offset for the Counter compare
3453 //
3454 registerOffset = EPWM_O_CMPA + (uint32_t)compModule * 2U;
3455
3456 //
3457 // Write to the counter compare registers.
3458 //
3459 if((compModule == EPWM_COUNTER_COMPARE_A) ||
3460 (compModule == EPWM_COUNTER_COMPARE_B))
3461 {
3462 //
3463 // Write to COMPA or COMPB bits
3464 //
3465 HWREGH(base + registerOffset + 0x2U) = compCount;
3466 }
3467 else
3468 {
3469 //
3470 // Write to COMPC or COMPD bits
3471 //
3472 HWREGH(base + registerOffset) = compCount;
3473 }
3474}
3475//*****************************************************************************
3476//
3490//
3491//*****************************************************************************
3492static inline uint16_t
3493EPWM_getCounterCompareValue(uint32_t base, EPWM_CounterCompareModule compModule)
3494{
3495 uint32_t registerOffset;
3496 uint16_t compCount;
3497
3498 //
3499 // Check the arguments
3500 //
3501 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
3502
3503 //
3504 // Get the register offset for the Counter compare
3505 //
3506 registerOffset = EPWM_O_CMPA + (uint32_t)compModule * 2U;
3507
3508 //
3509 // Read from the counter compare registers.
3510 //
3511 if((compModule == EPWM_COUNTER_COMPARE_A) ||
3512 (compModule == EPWM_COUNTER_COMPARE_B))
3513 {
3514 //
3515 // Read COMPA or COMPB bits
3516 //
3517 compCount = (uint16_t)((HWREG(base + registerOffset) &
3518 0xFFFF0000UL) >> 16U);
3519 }
3520 else
3521 {
3522 //
3523 // Read COMPC or COMPD bits
3524 //
3525 compCount = HWREGH(base + registerOffset);
3526 }
3527 return(compCount);
3528}
3529//*****************************************************************************
3530//
3543//
3544//*****************************************************************************
3545static inline bool
3546EPWM_getCounterCompareShadowStatus(uint32_t base,
3547 EPWM_CounterCompareModule compModule)
3548{
3549 //
3550 // Check the arguments
3551 //
3552 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
3553
3554 //
3555 // Check the validity of input.
3556 // COMPA and COMPB are valid input arguments.
3557 //
3558 ASSERT((compModule == EPWM_COUNTER_COMPARE_A) ||
3559 (compModule == EPWM_COUNTER_COMPARE_B));
3560
3561 //
3562 // Read the value of SHDWAFULL or SHDWBFULL bit
3563 //
3564 return((((HWREG(base + EPWM_O_CMPCTL) >>
3565 ((((uint16_t)compModule >> 1U) & 0x1U) + 8U)) &
3566 0x1U) == 0x1U));
3567}
3568//*****************************************************************************
3569//
3578//
3579//*****************************************************************************
3580static inline void
3581EPWM_enableLinkDutyHR(uint32_t base)
3582{
3583 //
3584 // Check the arguments
3585 //
3586 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
3587
3588 //
3589 // Set LINKDUTYHR bit in CMPCTL register
3590 //
3591 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_CMPCTL) |= EPWM_CMPCTL_LINKDUTYHR;
3592}
3593//*****************************************************************************
3594//
3603//
3604//*****************************************************************************
3605static inline void
3606EPWM_disableLinkDutyHR(uint32_t base)
3607{
3608 //
3609 // Check the arguments
3610 //
3611 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
3612
3613 //
3614 // Clear LINKDUTYHR bit in CMPCTL register
3615 //
3616 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_CMPCTL) &= ~EPWM_CMPCTL_LINKDUTYHR;
3617}
3618//
3619// Action Qualifier module related APIs
3620//
3621//*****************************************************************************
3622//
3649//
3650//*****************************************************************************
3651static inline void
3652EPWM_setActionQualifierShadowLoadMode(uint32_t base,
3653 EPWM_ActionQualifierModule aqModule,
3654 EPWM_ActionQualifierLoadMode loadMode)
3655{
3656 uint16_t syncModeOffset;
3657 uint16_t shadowModeOffset;
3658
3659 //
3660 // Check the arguments
3661 //
3662 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
3663
3664 syncModeOffset = 8U + (uint16_t)aqModule;
3665 shadowModeOffset = 4U + (uint16_t)aqModule;
3666
3667 //
3668 // Set the appropriate sync and load mode bits and also enable shadow
3669 // load mode. Shadow to active load can also be frozen.
3670 //
3671 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_AQCTL) = ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_AQCTL) &
3672 (~((0x3U << (uint16_t)aqModule) |
3673 (0x3U << (uint16_t)syncModeOffset))) |
3674 (0x1U << shadowModeOffset)) |
3675 ((((uint16_t)loadMode >> 2U) <<
3676 syncModeOffset) | (((uint16_t)loadMode &
3677 0x3U) << (uint16_t)aqModule)));
3678}
3679//*****************************************************************************
3680//
3693//
3694//*****************************************************************************
3695static inline void
3696EPWM_disableActionQualifierShadowLoadMode(uint32_t base,
3697 EPWM_ActionQualifierModule aqModule)
3698{
3699 uint16_t shadowModeOffset;
3700
3701 //
3702 // Check the arguments
3703 //
3704 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
3705
3706 shadowModeOffset = 4U + (uint16_t)aqModule;
3707
3708 //
3709 // Disable shadow load mode. Action qualifier is loaded on
3710 // immediate mode only.
3711 //
3712 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_AQCTL) &= ~(1U << shadowModeOffset);
3713}
3714//*****************************************************************************
3715//
3734//
3735//*****************************************************************************
3736static inline void
3737EPWM_setActionQualifierT1TriggerSource(uint32_t base,
3738 EPWM_ActionQualifierTriggerSource trigger)
3739{
3740 //
3741 // Check the arguments
3742 //
3743 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
3744
3745 //
3746 // Set T1 trigger source
3747 //
3748 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_AQTSRCSEL) =
3749 ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_AQTSRCSEL) & (~EPWM_AQTSRCSEL_T1SEL_M)) |
3750 ((uint16_t)trigger));
3751}
3752
3753//*****************************************************************************
3754//
3773//
3774//*****************************************************************************
3775static inline void
3776EPWM_setActionQualifierT2TriggerSource(uint32_t base,
3777 EPWM_ActionQualifierTriggerSource trigger)
3778{
3779 //
3780 // Check the arguments
3781 //
3782 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
3783
3784 //
3785 // Set T2 trigger source
3786 //
3787 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_AQTSRCSEL) =
3788 ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_AQTSRCSEL) & (~EPWM_AQTSRCSEL_T2SEL_M)) |
3789 ((uint16_t)trigger << EPWM_AQTSRCSEL_T2SEL_S));
3790}
3791//*****************************************************************************
3792//
3831//
3832//*****************************************************************************
3833static inline void
3834EPWM_setActionQualifierAction(uint32_t base,
3835 EPWM_ActionQualifierOutputModule epwmOutput,
3836 EPWM_ActionQualifierOutput output,
3837 EPWM_ActionQualifierOutputEvent event)
3838{
3839 uint32_t registerOffset;
3840 uint32_t registerTOffset;
3841
3842 //
3843 // Check the arguments
3844 //
3845 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
3846
3847 //
3848 // Get the register offset
3849 //
3850 registerOffset = EPWM_O_AQCTLA + (uint32_t)epwmOutput * 2U;
3851 registerTOffset = EPWM_O_AQCTLA2 + (uint32_t)epwmOutput * 2U;
3852
3853 //
3854 // If the event occurs on T1 or T2 events
3855 //
3856 if(((uint16_t)event & 0x1U) == 1U)
3857 {
3858 //
3859 // Write to T1U,T1D,T2U or T2D of AQCTLA2 register
3860 //
3861 HWREGH(base + registerTOffset) =
3862 ((HWREGH(base + registerTOffset) & ~(3U << ((uint16_t)event - 1U))) |
3863 ((uint16_t)output << ((uint16_t)event - 1U)));
3864 }
3865 else
3866 {
3867 //
3868 // Write to ZRO,PRD,CAU,CAD,CBU or CBD bits of AQCTLA register
3869 //
3870 HWREGH(base + registerOffset) =
3871 ((HWREGH(base + registerOffset) & ~(3U << (uint16_t)event)) |
3872 ((uint16_t)output << (uint16_t)event));
3873 }
3874}
3875//*****************************************************************************
3876//
3957//
3958//*****************************************************************************
3959static inline void
3960EPWM_setActionQualifierActionComplete(uint32_t base,
3961 EPWM_ActionQualifierOutputModule epwmOutput,
3962 uint16_t action)
3963{
3964 uint32_t registerOffset;
3965
3966 //
3967 // Check the arguments
3968 //
3969 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
3970
3971 //
3972 // Get the register offset
3973 //
3974 registerOffset = EPWM_O_AQCTLA + (uint32_t)epwmOutput * 2U;
3975
3976 //
3977 // Write to ZRO, PRD, CAU, CAD, CBU or CBD bits of AQCTLA register
3978 //
3979 HWREGH(base + registerOffset) = (uint16_t)action;
3980}
3981//*****************************************************************************
3982//
4040//
4041//*****************************************************************************
4042static inline void
4043EPWM_setAdditionalActionQualifierActionComplete(uint32_t base,
4044 EPWM_ActionQualifierOutputModule epwmOutput,
4045 uint16_t action)
4046{
4047 uint32_t registerTOffset;
4048
4049 //
4050 // Check the arguments
4051 //
4052 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
4053
4054 //
4055 // Get the register offset
4056 //
4057 registerTOffset = EPWM_O_AQCTLA2 + (uint32_t)epwmOutput * 2U;
4058
4059 //
4060 // Write to T1U, T1D, T2U or T2D of AQCTLA2 register
4061 //
4062 HWREGH(base + registerTOffset) = (uint16_t)action;
4063}
4064//*****************************************************************************
4065//
4084//
4085//*****************************************************************************
4086static inline void
4087EPWM_setActionQualifierContSWForceShadowMode(uint32_t base,
4088 EPWM_ActionQualifierContForce mode)
4089{
4090 //
4091 // Check the arguments
4092 //
4093 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
4094
4095 //
4096 // Set the Action qualifier software action reload mode.
4097 // Write to RLDCSF bit
4098 //
4099 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_AQSFRC) =
4100 ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_AQSFRC) & ~EPWM_AQSFRC_RLDCSF_M) |
4101 ((uint16_t)mode << EPWM_AQSFRC_RLDCSF_S));
4102}
4103//*****************************************************************************
4104//
4123//
4124//*****************************************************************************
4125static inline void
4126EPWM_setActionQualifierContSWForceAction(uint32_t base,
4127 EPWM_ActionQualifierOutputModule epwmOutput,
4128 EPWM_ActionQualifierSWOutput output)
4129{
4130 //
4131 // Check the arguments
4132 //
4133 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
4134
4135 //
4136 // Initiate a continuous software forced output
4137 //
4138 if(epwmOutput == EPWM_AQ_OUTPUT_A)
4139 {
4140 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_AQCSFRC) =
4141 ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_AQCSFRC) & ~EPWM_AQCSFRC_CSFA_M) |
4142 ((uint16_t)output));
4143 }
4144 else
4145 {
4146 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_AQCSFRC) =
4147 ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_AQCSFRC) & ~EPWM_AQCSFRC_CSFB_M) |
4148 ((uint16_t)output << EPWM_AQCSFRC_CSFB_S)) ;
4149 }
4150}
4151//*****************************************************************************
4152//
4173//
4174//*****************************************************************************
4175static inline void
4176EPWM_setActionQualifierSWAction(uint32_t base,
4177 EPWM_ActionQualifierOutputModule epwmOutput,
4178 EPWM_ActionQualifierOutput output)
4179{
4180 //
4181 // Check the arguments
4182 //
4183 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
4184
4185 //
4186 // Set the one time software forced action
4187 //
4188 if(epwmOutput == EPWM_AQ_OUTPUT_A)
4189 {
4190 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_AQSFRC) =
4191 ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_AQSFRC) & ~EPWM_AQSFRC_ACTSFA_M) |
4192 ((uint16_t)output));
4193 }
4194 else
4195 {
4196 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_AQSFRC) =
4197 ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_AQSFRC) & ~EPWM_AQSFRC_ACTSFB_M) |
4198 ((uint16_t)output << EPWM_AQSFRC_ACTSFB_S));
4199 }
4200}
4201//*****************************************************************************
4202//
4215//
4216//*****************************************************************************
4217static inline void
4218EPWM_forceActionQualifierSWAction(uint32_t base,
4219 EPWM_ActionQualifierOutputModule epwmOutput)
4220{
4221 //
4222 // Check the arguments
4223 //
4224 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
4225
4226 //
4227 // Initiate a software forced event
4228 //
4229 if(epwmOutput == EPWM_AQ_OUTPUT_A)
4230 {
4231 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_AQSFRC) |= EPWM_AQSFRC_OTSFA;
4232 }
4233 else
4234 {
4235 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_AQSFRC) |= EPWM_AQSFRC_OTSFB;
4236 }
4237}
4238//
4239// Dead Band Module related APIs
4240//
4241//*****************************************************************************
4242//
4261//
4262//*****************************************************************************
4263static inline void
4264EPWM_setDeadBandOutputSwapMode(uint32_t base, EPWM_DeadBandOutput output,
4265 bool enableSwapMode)
4266{
4267 uint16_t mask;
4268
4269 //
4270 // Check the arguments
4271 //
4272 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
4273
4274 mask = (uint16_t)1U << ((uint16_t)output + EPWM_DBCTL_OUTSWAP_S);
4275
4276 if(enableSwapMode)
4277 {
4278 //
4279 // Set the appropriate outswap bit to swap output
4280 //
4281 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DBCTL) = (HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DBCTL) | mask);
4282 }
4283 else
4284 {
4285 //
4286 // Clear the appropriate outswap bit to disable output swap
4287 //
4288 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DBCTL) = (HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DBCTL) & ~mask);
4289 }
4290}
4291//*****************************************************************************
4292//
4311//
4312//*****************************************************************************
4313static inline void
4314EPWM_setDeadBandDelayMode(uint32_t base, EPWM_DeadBandDelayMode delayMode,
4315 bool enableDelayMode)
4316{
4317 uint16_t mask;
4318
4319 //
4320 // Check the arguments
4321 //
4322 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
4323
4324 mask = (uint16_t)1U << ((uint16_t)delayMode + EPWM_DBCTL_OUT_MODE_S);
4325
4326 if(enableDelayMode)
4327 {
4328 //
4329 // Set the appropriate outmode bit to enable Dead Band delay
4330 //
4331 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DBCTL) = (HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DBCTL) | mask);
4332 }
4333 else
4334 {
4335 //
4336 // Clear the appropriate outswap bit to disable output swap
4337 //
4338 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DBCTL) = (HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DBCTL) & ~ mask);
4339 }
4340}
4341//*****************************************************************************
4342//
4360//
4361//*****************************************************************************
4362static inline void
4363EPWM_setDeadBandDelayPolarity(uint32_t base,
4364 EPWM_DeadBandDelayMode delayMode,
4365 EPWM_DeadBandPolarity polarity)
4366{
4367 uint16_t shift;
4368
4369 //
4370 // Check the arguments
4371 //
4372 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
4373
4374 shift = (((uint16_t)delayMode ^ 0x1U) + EPWM_DBCTL_POLSEL_S);
4375
4376 //
4377 // Set the appropriate polsel bits for dead band polarity
4378 //
4379 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DBCTL) =
4380 ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DBCTL) & ~ (1U << shift)) |
4381 ((uint16_t)polarity << shift));
4382}
4383//*****************************************************************************
4384//
4398//
4399//*****************************************************************************
4400static inline void
4401EPWM_setRisingEdgeDeadBandDelayInput(uint32_t base, uint16_t input)
4402{
4403 //
4404 // Check the arguments
4405 //
4406 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
4407 ASSERT((input == EPWM_DB_INPUT_EPWMA) ||
4408 (input == EPWM_DB_INPUT_EPWMB));
4409
4410 //
4411 // Set the Rising Edge Delay input
4412 //
4413 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DBCTL) =
4414 ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DBCTL) & ~(1U << (EPWM_DBCTL_IN_MODE_S))) |
4415 (input << EPWM_DBCTL_IN_MODE_S));
4416}
4417//*****************************************************************************
4418//
4435//
4436//*****************************************************************************
4437static inline void
4438EPWM_setFallingEdgeDeadBandDelayInput(uint32_t base, uint16_t input)
4439{
4440 //
4441 // Check the arguments
4442 //
4443 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
4444 ASSERT((input == EPWM_DB_INPUT_EPWMA) ||
4445 (input == EPWM_DB_INPUT_EPWMB) ||
4446 (input == EPWM_DB_INPUT_DB_RED));
4447
4448 if(input == EPWM_DB_INPUT_DB_RED)
4449 {
4450 //
4451 // Set the Falling Edge Delay input
4452 //
4453 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DBCTL) |= EPWM_DBCTL_DEDB_MODE;
4454 }
4455 else
4456 {
4457 //
4458 // Set the Falling Edge Delay input
4459 //
4460 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DBCTL) &= ~EPWM_DBCTL_DEDB_MODE;
4461
4462 //
4463 // Set the Rising Edge Delay input
4464 //
4465 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DBCTL) =
4466 ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DBCTL) & ~(1U << (EPWM_DBCTL_IN_MODE_S + 1U))) |
4467 (input << (EPWM_DBCTL_IN_MODE_S + 1U)));
4468 }
4469}
4470//*****************************************************************************
4471//
4487//
4488//*****************************************************************************
4489static inline void
4490EPWM_setDeadBandControlShadowLoadMode(uint32_t base,
4491 EPWM_DeadBandControlLoadMode loadMode)
4492{
4493 //
4494 // Check the arguments
4495 //
4496 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
4497
4498 //
4499 // Enable the shadow mode and setup the load event
4500 //
4501 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DBCTL2) =
4502 ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DBCTL2) & ~EPWM_DBCTL2_LOADDBCTLMODE_M) |
4503 (EPWM_DBCTL2_SHDWDBCTLMODE | (uint16_t)loadMode));
4504}
4505//*****************************************************************************
4506//
4515//
4516//*****************************************************************************
4517static inline void
4518EPWM_disableDeadBandControlShadowLoadMode(uint32_t base)
4519{
4520 //
4521 // Check the arguments
4522 //
4523 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
4524
4525 //
4526 // Disable the shadow load mode. Only immediate load mode only.
4527 //
4528 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DBCTL2) =
4529 (HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DBCTL2) & ~EPWM_DBCTL2_SHDWDBCTLMODE);
4530}
4531//*****************************************************************************
4532//
4547//
4548//*****************************************************************************
4549static inline void
4550EPWM_setRisingEdgeDelayCountShadowLoadMode(uint32_t base,
4551 EPWM_RisingEdgeDelayLoadMode loadMode)
4552{
4553 //
4554 // Check the arguments
4555 //
4556 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
4557
4558 //
4559 // Enable the shadow mode. Set-up the load mode
4560 //
4561 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DBCTL) =
4562 ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DBCTL) & ~EPWM_DBCTL_LOADREDMODE_M) |
4563 ((uint16_t)EPWM_DBCTL_SHDWDBREDMODE |
4564 ((uint16_t)loadMode << EPWM_DBCTL_LOADREDMODE_S)));
4565
4566}
4567//*****************************************************************************
4568//
4576//
4577//*****************************************************************************
4578static inline void
4579EPWM_disableRisingEdgeDelayCountShadowLoadMode(uint32_t base)
4580{
4581 //
4582 // Check the arguments
4583 //
4584 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
4585
4586 //
4587 // Disable the shadow mode.
4588 //
4589 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DBCTL) =
4590 (HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DBCTL) & ~EPWM_DBCTL_SHDWDBREDMODE);
4591
4592}
4593//*****************************************************************************
4594//
4609//
4610//*****************************************************************************
4611static inline void
4612EPWM_setFallingEdgeDelayCountShadowLoadMode(uint32_t base,
4613 EPWM_FallingEdgeDelayLoadMode loadMode)
4614{
4615 //
4616 // Check the arguments
4617 //
4618 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
4619
4620 //
4621 // Enable the shadow mode. Setup the load mode.
4622 //
4623 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DBCTL) =
4624 ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DBCTL) & ~EPWM_DBCTL_LOADFEDMODE_M) |
4625 (EPWM_DBCTL_SHDWDBFEDMODE |
4626 ((uint16_t)loadMode << EPWM_DBCTL_LOADFEDMODE_S)));
4627
4628}
4629//*****************************************************************************
4630//
4639//
4640//*****************************************************************************
4641static inline void
4642EPWM_disableFallingEdgeDelayCountShadowLoadMode(uint32_t base)
4643{
4644 //
4645 // Check the arguments
4646 //
4647 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
4648
4649 //
4650 // Disable the shadow mode.
4651 //
4652 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DBCTL) =
4653 (HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DBCTL) & ~EPWM_DBCTL_SHDWDBFEDMODE);
4654}
4655//*****************************************************************************
4656//
4671//
4672//*****************************************************************************
4673static inline void
4674EPWM_setDeadBandCounterClock(uint32_t base,
4675 EPWM_DeadBandClockMode clockMode)
4676{
4677 //
4678 // Check the arguments
4679 //
4680 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
4681
4682 //
4683 // Set the DB clock mode
4684 //
4685 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DBCTL) =
4686 ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DBCTL) & ~EPWM_DBCTL_HALFCYCLE) |
4687 ((uint16_t)clockMode << 15U));
4688}
4689//*****************************************************************************
4690//
4700//
4701//*****************************************************************************
4702static inline void
4703EPWM_setRisingEdgeDelayCount(uint32_t base, uint16_t redCount)
4704{
4705 //
4706 // Check the arguments
4707 //
4708 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
4709 ASSERT(redCount < 0x4000U);
4710
4711 //
4712 // Set the RED (Rising Edge Delay) count
4713 //
4714 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DBRED) = redCount;
4715}
4716//*****************************************************************************
4717//
4727//
4728//*****************************************************************************
4729static inline void
4730EPWM_setFallingEdgeDelayCount(uint32_t base, uint16_t fedCount)
4731{
4732 //
4733 // Check the arguments
4734 //
4735 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
4736 ASSERT(fedCount < 0x4000U);
4737
4738 //
4739 // Set the RED (Rising Edge Delay) count
4740 //
4741 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DBFED) = fedCount;
4742}
4743//
4744// Chopper module related APIs
4745//
4746//*****************************************************************************
4747//
4755//
4756//*****************************************************************************
4757static inline void
4758EPWM_enableChopper(uint32_t base)
4759{
4760 //
4761 // Check the arguments
4762 //
4763 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
4764
4765 //
4766 // Set CHPEN bit. Enable Chopper
4767 //
4768 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_PCCTL) |= EPWM_PCCTL_CHPEN;
4769}
4770//*****************************************************************************
4771//
4779//
4780//*****************************************************************************
4781static inline void
4782EPWM_disableChopper(uint32_t base)
4783{
4784 //
4785 // Check the arguments
4786 //
4787 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
4788
4789 //
4790 // Clear CHPEN bit. Disable Chopper
4791 //
4792 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_PCCTL) &= ~EPWM_PCCTL_CHPEN;
4793}
4794//*****************************************************************************
4795//
4807//
4808//*****************************************************************************
4809static inline void
4810EPWM_setChopperDutyCycle(uint32_t base, uint16_t dutyCycleCount)
4811{
4812 //
4813 // Check the arguments
4814 //
4815 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
4816 ASSERT(dutyCycleCount < 7U);
4817
4818 //
4819 // Set the chopper duty cycle
4820 //
4821 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_PCCTL) =
4822 ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_PCCTL) & ~EPWM_PCCTL_CHPDUTY_M) |
4823 (dutyCycleCount << EPWM_PCCTL_CHPDUTY_S));
4824}
4825//*****************************************************************************
4826//
4838//
4839//*****************************************************************************
4840static inline void
4841EPWM_setChopperFreq(uint32_t base, uint16_t freqDiv)
4842{
4843 //
4844 // Check the arguments
4845 //
4846 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
4847 ASSERT(freqDiv < 8U);
4848
4849 //
4850 // Set the chopper clock
4851 //
4852 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_PCCTL) =
4853 ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_PCCTL) &
4854 ~(uint16_t)EPWM_PCCTL_CHPFREQ_M) |
4855 (freqDiv << EPWM_PCCTL_CHPFREQ_S));
4856}
4857//*****************************************************************************
4858//
4870//
4871//*****************************************************************************
4872static inline void
4873EPWM_setChopperFirstPulseWidth(uint32_t base, uint16_t firstPulseWidth)
4874{
4875 //
4876 // Check the arguments
4877 //
4878 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
4879 ASSERT(firstPulseWidth < 16U);
4880
4881 //
4882 // Set the chopper clock
4883 //
4884 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_PCCTL) =
4885 ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_PCCTL) &
4886 ~(uint16_t)EPWM_PCCTL_OSHTWTH_M) |
4887 (firstPulseWidth << EPWM_PCCTL_OSHTWTH_S));
4888}
4889//
4890// Trip Zone module related APIs
4891//
4892//*****************************************************************************
4893//
4923//
4924//*****************************************************************************
4925static inline void
4926EPWM_enableTripZoneSignals(uint32_t base, uint16_t tzSignal)
4927{
4928 //
4929 // Check the arguments
4930 //
4931 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
4932
4933 //
4934 // Set the trip zone bits
4935 //
4936
4937 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TZSEL) |= tzSignal;
4938
4939}
4940//*****************************************************************************
4941//
4971//
4972//*****************************************************************************
4973static inline void
4974EPWM_disableTripZoneSignals(uint32_t base, uint16_t tzSignal)
4975{
4976 //
4977 // Check the arguments
4978 //
4979 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
4980
4981 //
4982 // Clear the trip zone bits
4983 //
4984
4985 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TZSEL) &= ~tzSignal;
4986
4987}
4988//*****************************************************************************
4989//
5005//
5006//*****************************************************************************
5007static inline void
5008EPWM_enableTripZone2Signals(uint32_t base, uint16_t tzSignal)
5009{
5010 //
5011 // Check the arguments
5012 //
5013 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
5014
5015 //
5016 // Set the trip zone bits
5017 //
5018 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TZSEL2) |= tzSignal;
5019}
5020
5021//*****************************************************************************
5022//
5038//
5039//*****************************************************************************
5040static inline void
5041EPWM_disableTripZone2Signals(uint32_t base, uint16_t tzSignal)
5042{
5043 //
5044 // Check the arguments
5045 //
5046 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
5047
5048 //
5049 // Clear the trip zone bits
5050 //
5051 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TZSEL2) &= ~tzSignal;
5052}
5053//*****************************************************************************
5054//
5083//
5084//*****************************************************************************
5085static inline void
5086EPWM_setTripZoneDigitalCompareEventCondition(uint32_t base,
5087 EPWM_TripZoneDigitalCompareOutput dcType,
5088 EPWM_TripZoneDigitalCompareOutputEvent dcEvent)
5089{
5090 //
5091 // Check the arguments
5092 //
5093 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
5094
5095 //
5096 // Set Digital Compare Events conditions that cause a Digital Compare trip
5097 //
5098
5099 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TZDCSEL) =
5100 ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TZDCSEL) & ~(0x7U << (uint16_t)dcType)) |
5101 ((uint16_t)dcEvent << (uint16_t)dcType));
5102
5103}
5104
5105//*****************************************************************************
5106//
5116//
5117//*****************************************************************************
5118static inline void
5119EPWM_enableTripZoneAdvAction(uint32_t base)
5120{
5121 //
5122 // Check the arguments
5123 //
5124 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
5125
5126 //
5127 // Enable Advanced feature. Set ETZE bit
5128 //
5129
5130 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TZCTL2) |= EPWM_TZCTL2_ETZE;
5131
5132}
5133//*****************************************************************************
5134//
5142//
5143//*****************************************************************************
5144static inline void
5145EPWM_disableTripZoneAdvAction(uint32_t base)
5146{
5147 //
5148 // Check the arguments
5149 //
5150 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
5151
5152 //
5153 // Disable Advanced feature. clear ETZE bit
5154 //
5155
5156 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TZCTL2) &= ~EPWM_TZCTL2_ETZE;
5157
5158}
5159//*****************************************************************************
5160//
5189//
5190//*****************************************************************************
5191static inline void
5192EPWM_setTripZoneAction(uint32_t base, EPWM_TripZoneEvent tzEvent,
5193 EPWM_TripZoneAction tzAction)
5194{
5195 //
5196 // Check the arguments
5197 //
5198 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
5199
5200 //
5201 // Set the Action for Trip Zone events
5202 //
5203
5204 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TZCTL) =
5205 ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TZCTL) & ~(0x3U << (uint16_t)tzEvent)) |
5206 ((uint16_t)tzAction << (uint16_t)tzEvent)) ;
5207
5208}
5209//*****************************************************************************
5210//
5245//
5246//*****************************************************************************
5247static inline void
5248EPWM_setTripZoneAdvAction(uint32_t base, EPWM_TripZoneAdvancedEvent tzAdvEvent,
5249 EPWM_TripZoneAdvancedAction tzAdvAction)
5250{
5251 //
5252 // Check the arguments
5253 //
5254 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
5255
5256 //
5257 // Set the Advanced Action for Trip Zone events
5258 //
5259
5260 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TZCTL2) =
5261 ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TZCTL2) & ~(0x7U << (uint16_t)tzAdvEvent)) |
5262 ((uint16_t)tzAdvAction << (uint16_t)tzAdvEvent));
5263
5264 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TZCTL2) |= EPWM_TZCTL2_ETZE;
5265
5266}
5267//*****************************************************************************
5268//
5300//
5301//*****************************************************************************
5302static inline void
5303EPWM_setTripZoneAdvDigitalCompareActionA(uint32_t base,
5304 EPWM_TripZoneAdvDigitalCompareEvent tzAdvDCEvent,
5305 EPWM_TripZoneAdvancedAction tzAdvDCAction)
5306{
5307 //
5308 // Check the arguments
5309 //
5310 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
5311
5312 //
5313 // Set the Advanced Action for Trip Zone events
5314 //
5315
5316 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TZCTLDCA) =
5317 ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TZCTLDCA) & ~(0x7U << (uint16_t)tzAdvDCEvent)) |
5318 ((uint16_t)tzAdvDCAction << (uint16_t)tzAdvDCEvent));
5319
5320 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TZCTL2) |= EPWM_TZCTL2_ETZE;
5321
5322}
5323//*****************************************************************************
5324//
5356//
5357//*****************************************************************************
5358static inline void EPWM_setTripZoneAdvDigitalCompareActionB(uint32_t base,
5359 EPWM_TripZoneAdvDigitalCompareEvent tzAdvDCEvent,
5360 EPWM_TripZoneAdvancedAction tzAdvDCAction)
5361{
5362 //
5363 // Check the arguments
5364 //
5365 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
5366
5367 //
5368 // Set the Advanced Action for Trip Zone events
5369 //
5370
5371 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TZCTLDCB) =
5372 ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TZCTLDCB) & ~(0x7U << (uint16_t)tzAdvDCEvent)) |
5373 ((uint16_t)tzAdvDCAction << (uint16_t)tzAdvDCEvent));
5374
5375 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TZCTL2) |= EPWM_TZCTL2_ETZE;
5376
5377}
5378//*****************************************************************************
5379//
5399//
5400//*****************************************************************************
5401static inline void
5402EPWM_enableTripZoneInterrupt(uint32_t base, uint16_t tzInterrupt)
5403{
5404 //
5405 // Check the arguments
5406 //
5407 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
5408 ASSERT((tzInterrupt > 0U) && (tzInterrupt <= 0x80U));
5409
5410 //
5411 // Enable Trip zone interrupts
5412 //
5413
5414 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TZEINT) |= tzInterrupt;
5415
5416}
5417//*****************************************************************************
5418//
5438//
5439//***************************************************************************
5440static inline void
5441EPWM_disableTripZoneInterrupt(uint32_t base, uint16_t tzInterrupt)
5442{
5443 //
5444 // Check the arguments
5445 //
5446 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
5447 ASSERT((tzInterrupt > 0U) && (tzInterrupt <= 0x80U));
5448
5449 //
5450 // Disable Trip zone interrupts
5451 //
5452
5453 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TZEINT) &= ~tzInterrupt;
5454
5455}
5456//*****************************************************************************
5457//
5475//
5476//***************************************************************************
5477static inline uint16_t
5478EPWM_getTripZoneFlagStatus(uint32_t base)
5479{
5480 //
5481 // Check the arguments
5482 //
5483 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
5484
5485 //
5486 // Return the Trip zone flag status
5487 //
5488 return(HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TZFLG) & 0xFFU);
5489}
5490//*****************************************************************************
5491//
5512//
5513//***************************************************************************
5514static inline uint16_t
5515EPWM_getCycleByCycleTripZoneFlagStatus(uint32_t base)
5516{
5517 //
5518 // Check the arguments
5519 //
5520 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
5521
5522 //
5523 // Return the Cycle By Cycle Trip zone flag status
5524 //
5525 return(HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TZCBCFLG) & 0x1FFU);
5526}
5527//*****************************************************************************
5528//
5548//
5549//***************************************************************************
5550static inline uint16_t
5551EPWM_getOneShotTripZoneFlagStatus(uint32_t base)
5552{
5553 //
5554 // Check the arguments
5555 //
5556 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
5557
5558 //
5559 // Return the One Shot Trip zone flag status
5560 //
5561 return(HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TZOSTFLG) & 0x1FFU);
5562}
5563//*****************************************************************************
5564//
5581//
5582//**************************************************************************
5583static inline void
5584EPWM_selectCycleByCycleTripZoneClearEvent(uint32_t base,
5585 EPWM_CycleByCycleTripZoneClearMode clearEvent)
5586{
5587 //
5588 // Check the arguments
5589 //
5590 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
5591
5592 //
5593 // Set the Cycle by Cycle Trip Latch mode
5594 //
5595
5596 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TZCLR) =
5597 ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TZCLR) & ~EPWM_TZCLR_CBCPULSE_M) |
5598 ((uint16_t)clearEvent << EPWM_TZCLR_CBCPULSE_S));
5599
5600}
5601//*****************************************************************************
5602//
5623//
5624//***************************************************************************
5625static inline void
5626EPWM_clearTripZoneFlag(uint32_t base, uint16_t tzFlags)
5627{
5628 //
5629 // Check the arguments
5630 //
5631 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
5632 ASSERT(tzFlags <= 0x80U);
5633
5634 //
5635 // Clear Trip zone event fag
5636 //
5637
5638 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TZCLR) |= tzFlags;
5639
5640}
5641//*****************************************************************************
5642//
5663//
5664//***************************************************************************
5665static inline void
5666EPWM_clearCycleByCycleTripZoneFlag(uint32_t base, uint16_t tzCBCFlags)
5667{
5668 //
5669 // Check the arguments
5670 //
5671 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
5672 ASSERT(tzCBCFlags < 0x800U);
5673
5674 //
5675 // Clear the Cycle By Cycle Trip zone flag
5676 //
5677
5678 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TZCBCCLR) |= tzCBCFlags;
5679
5680}
5681//*****************************************************************************
5682//
5701//
5702//***************************************************************************
5703static inline void
5704EPWM_clearOneShotTripZoneFlag(uint32_t base, uint16_t tzOSTFlags)
5705{
5706 //
5707 // Check the arguments
5708 //
5709 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
5710 ASSERT(tzOSTFlags < 0x800U);
5711
5712 //
5713 // Clear the Cycle By Cycle Trip zone flag
5714 //
5715
5716 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TZOSTCLR) |= tzOSTFlags;
5717
5718}
5719//*****************************************************************************
5720//
5737//
5738//***************************************************************************
5739static inline void
5740EPWM_forceTripZoneEvent(uint32_t base, uint16_t tzForceEvent)
5741{
5742 //
5743 // Check the arguments
5744 //
5745 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
5746 ASSERT((tzForceEvent & 0xFF81U) == 0U);
5747
5748 //
5749 // Force a Trip Zone event
5750 //
5751
5752 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TZFRC) |= tzForceEvent;
5753
5754}
5755//*****************************************************************************
5756//
5773//
5774//***************************************************************************
5775static inline void
5776EPWM_enableTripOutSource(uint32_t base, EPWM_selectTripOutSource tzTripOut)
5777{
5778 //
5779 // Check the arguments
5780 //
5781 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
5782
5783 //
5784 // Configures the TRIPOUT source
5785 //
5786
5787 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TZTRIPOUTSEL) |= 1U << (uint32_t)tzTripOut;
5788
5789}
5790//*****************************************************************************
5791//
5808//
5809//***************************************************************************
5810static inline void
5811EPWM_disableTripOutSource(uint32_t base, EPWM_selectTripOutSource tzTripOut)
5812{
5813 //
5814 // Check the arguments
5815 //
5816 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
5817
5818 //
5819 // Disables the TRIPOUT source
5820 //
5821
5822 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TZTRIPOUTSEL) &= ~(1U << (uint32_t)tzTripOut);
5823
5824}
5825//
5826// Event Trigger related APIs
5827//
5828//*****************************************************************************
5829//
5837//
5838//*****************************************************************************
5839static inline void
5840EPWM_enableInterrupt(uint32_t base)
5841{
5842 //
5843 // Check the arguments
5844 //
5845 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
5846
5847 //
5848 // Enable ePWM interrupt
5849 //
5850 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETSEL) |= EPWM_ETSEL_INTEN;
5851}
5852//*****************************************************************************
5853//
5861//
5862//*****************************************************************************
5863static inline void
5864EPWM_disableInterrupt(uint32_t base)
5865{
5866 //
5867 // Check the arguments
5868 //
5869 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
5870
5871 //
5872 // Disable ePWM interrupt
5873 //
5874 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETSEL) &= ~EPWM_ETSEL_INTEN;
5875}
5876//*****************************************************************************
5877//
5902//
5903//*****************************************************************************
5904static inline void
5905EPWM_setInterruptSource(uint32_t base, uint16_t interruptSource)
5906{
5907 uint16_t intSource;
5908
5909 //
5910 // Check the arguments
5911 //
5912 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
5913 ASSERT(((interruptSource > 0U) && (interruptSource < 9U)) ||
5914 (interruptSource == 10U) || (interruptSource == 12U) ||
5915 (interruptSource == 14U));
5916
5917 if((interruptSource == EPWM_INT_TBCTR_U_CMPC) ||
5918 (interruptSource == EPWM_INT_TBCTR_U_CMPD) ||
5919 (interruptSource == EPWM_INT_TBCTR_D_CMPC) ||
5920 (interruptSource == EPWM_INT_TBCTR_D_CMPD))
5921 {
5922 //
5923 // Shift the interrupt source by 1
5924 //
5925 intSource = interruptSource >> 1U;
5926
5927 //
5928 // Enable events based on comp C or comp D
5929 //
5930 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETSEL) |= EPWM_ETSEL_INTSELCMP;
5931 }
5932 else if((interruptSource == EPWM_INT_TBCTR_U_CMPA) ||
5933 (interruptSource == EPWM_INT_TBCTR_U_CMPB) ||
5934 (interruptSource == EPWM_INT_TBCTR_D_CMPA) ||
5935 (interruptSource == EPWM_INT_TBCTR_D_CMPB))
5936 {
5937 intSource = interruptSource;
5938
5939 //
5940 // Enable events based on comp A or comp B
5941 //
5942 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETSEL) &= ~EPWM_ETSEL_INTSELCMP;
5943 }
5944 else
5945 {
5946 intSource = interruptSource;
5947 }
5948
5949 //
5950 // Set the interrupt source
5951 //
5952 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETSEL) =
5953 ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETSEL) & ~EPWM_ETSEL_INTSEL_M) | intSource);
5954}
5955//*****************************************************************************
5956//
5967//
5968//*****************************************************************************
5969static inline void
5970EPWM_setInterruptEventCount(uint32_t base, uint16_t eventCount)
5971{
5972 //
5973 // Check the arguments
5974 //
5975 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
5976 ASSERT(eventCount < 16U);
5977
5978 //
5979 // Enable advanced feature of interrupt every up to 15 events
5980 //
5981 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETPS) |= EPWM_ETPS_INTPSSEL;
5982 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETINTPS) =
5983 ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETINTPS) & ~EPWM_ETINTPS_INTPRD2_M) |
5984 eventCount);
5985}
5986//*****************************************************************************
5987//
5997//
5998//*****************************************************************************
5999static inline bool
6000EPWM_getEventTriggerInterruptStatus(uint32_t base)
6001{
6002 //
6003 // Check the arguments
6004 //
6005 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
6006
6007 //
6008 // Return INT bit of ETFLG register
6009 //
6010 return(((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETFLG) & 0x1U) == 0x1U));
6011}
6012//*****************************************************************************
6013//
6021//
6022//*****************************************************************************
6023static inline void
6024EPWM_clearEventTriggerInterruptFlag(uint32_t base)
6025{
6026 //
6027 // Check the arguments
6028 //
6029 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
6030
6031 //
6032 // Clear INT bit of ETCLR register
6033 //
6034 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETCLR) |= EPWM_ETCLR_INT;
6035}
6036//*****************************************************************************
6037//
6048//
6049//*****************************************************************************
6050static inline void
6051EPWM_enableInterruptEventCountInit(uint32_t base)
6052{
6053 //
6054 // Check the arguments
6055 //
6056 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
6057
6058 //
6059 // Enable interrupt event count initializing/loading
6060 //
6061 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETCNTINITCTL) |= EPWM_ETCNTINITCTL_INTINITEN;
6062}
6063//*****************************************************************************
6064//
6073//
6074//*****************************************************************************
6075static inline void
6076EPWM_disableInterruptEventCountInit(uint32_t base)
6077{
6078 //
6079 // Check the arguments
6080 //
6081 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
6082
6083 //
6084 // Disable interrupt event count initializing/loading
6085 //
6086 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETCNTINITCTL) &= ~EPWM_ETCNTINITCTL_INTINITEN;
6087}
6088//*****************************************************************************
6089//
6101//
6102//*****************************************************************************
6103static inline void
6104EPWM_forceInterruptEventCountInit(uint32_t base)
6105{
6106 //
6107 // Check the arguments
6108 //
6109 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
6110
6111 //
6112 // Load the Interrupt Event counter value
6113 //
6114 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETCNTINITCTL) |= EPWM_ETCNTINITCTL_INTINITFRC;
6115}
6116//*****************************************************************************
6117//
6128//
6129//*****************************************************************************
6130static inline void
6131EPWM_setInterruptEventCountInitValue(uint32_t base, uint16_t eventCount)
6132{
6133 //
6134 // Check the arguments
6135 //
6136 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
6137 ASSERT(eventCount < 16U);
6138
6139 //
6140 // Set the Pre-interrupt event count
6141 //
6142 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETCNTINIT) =
6143 ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETCNTINIT) & ~EPWM_ETCNTINIT_INTINIT_M) |
6144 (uint16_t)(eventCount & 0xFU)); // why 0xFU?
6145}
6146//*****************************************************************************
6147//
6155//
6156//*****************************************************************************
6157static inline uint16_t
6158EPWM_getInterruptEventCount(uint32_t base)
6159{
6160 //
6161 // Check the arguments
6162 //
6163 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
6164
6165 //
6166 // Return the interrupt event count
6167 //
6168 return(((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETINTPS) & EPWM_ETINTPS_INTCNT2_M) >>
6169 EPWM_ETINTPS_INTCNT2_S));
6170}
6171//*****************************************************************************
6172//
6180//
6181//*****************************************************************************
6182static inline void
6183EPWM_forceEventTriggerInterrupt(uint32_t base)
6184{
6185 //
6186 // Check the arguments
6187 //
6188 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
6189
6190 //
6191 // Set INT bit of ETFRC register
6192 //
6193 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETFRC) |= EPWM_ETFRC_INT;
6194}
6195//*****************************************************************************
6196//
6223//
6224//*****************************************************************************
6225static inline void
6226EPWM_setMixEvtTriggerSource(uint32_t base, EPWM_ETMixSignalSelect etmixSignal,
6227 EPWM_ETMixTriggerSource interruptSource)
6228{
6229 uint32_t registerOffset;
6230
6231 //
6232 // Check the arguments
6233 //
6234 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
6235 ASSERT((uint32_t)interruptSource < 11U);
6236
6237 registerOffset = base + EPWM_O_ETINTMIXEN + (uint32_t)etmixSignal * 2U;
6238
6239 //
6240 // Set the ETMIX source
6241 //
6242 HWREGH(registerOffset) |= 1U << (uint32_t)interruptSource;
6243}
6244//
6245// ADC SOC configuration related APIs
6246//
6247//*****************************************************************************
6248//
6260//
6261//*****************************************************************************
6262static inline void
6263EPWM_enableADCTrigger(uint32_t base, EPWM_ADCStartOfConversionType adcSOCType)
6264{
6265 //
6266 // Check the arguments
6267 //
6268 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
6269
6270 //
6271 // Enable an SOC
6272 //
6273 if(adcSOCType == EPWM_SOC_A)
6274 {
6275 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETSEL) |= EPWM_ETSEL_SOCAEN;
6276 }
6277 else
6278 {
6279 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETSEL) |= EPWM_ETSEL_SOCBEN;
6280 }
6281}
6282//*****************************************************************************
6283//
6295//
6296//*****************************************************************************
6297static inline void
6298EPWM_disableADCTrigger(uint32_t base, EPWM_ADCStartOfConversionType adcSOCType)
6299{
6300 //
6301 // Check the arguments
6302 //
6303 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
6304
