6305 //
6306 // Disable an SOC
6307 //
6308 if(adcSOCType == EPWM_SOC_A)
6309 {
6310 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETSEL) &= ~EPWM_ETSEL_SOCAEN;
6311 }
6312 else
6313 {
6314 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETSEL) &= ~EPWM_ETSEL_SOCBEN;
6315 }
6316}
6317//*****************************************************************************
6318//
6346//
6347//*****************************************************************************
6348static inline void
6349EPWM_setADCTriggerSource(uint32_t base,
6350 EPWM_ADCStartOfConversionType adcSOCType,
6351 EPWM_ADCStartOfConversionSource socSource)
6352{
6353 uint16_t source;
6354
6355 //
6356 // Check the arguments
6357 //
6358 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
6359
6360 if((socSource == EPWM_SOC_TBCTR_U_CMPC) ||
6361 (socSource == EPWM_SOC_TBCTR_U_CMPD) ||
6362 (socSource == EPWM_SOC_TBCTR_D_CMPC) ||
6363 (socSource == EPWM_SOC_TBCTR_D_CMPD))
6364 {
6365 source = (uint16_t)socSource >> 1U;
6366 }
6367 else
6368 {
6369 source = (uint16_t)socSource;
6370 }
6371
6372 if(adcSOCType == EPWM_SOC_A)
6373 {
6374 //
6375 // Set the SOC source
6376 //
6377 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETSEL) =
6378 ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETSEL) & ~EPWM_ETSEL_SOCASEL_M) |
6379 (source << EPWM_ETSEL_SOCASEL_S));
6380
6381 //
6382 // Enable the comparator selection
6383 //
6384 if((socSource == EPWM_SOC_TBCTR_U_CMPA) ||
6385 (socSource == EPWM_SOC_TBCTR_U_CMPB) ||
6386 (socSource == EPWM_SOC_TBCTR_D_CMPA) ||
6387 (socSource == EPWM_SOC_TBCTR_D_CMPB))
6388 {
6389 //
6390 // Enable events based on comp A or comp B
6391 //
6392 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETSEL) &= ~EPWM_ETSEL_SOCASELCMP;
6393 }
6394 else if((socSource == EPWM_SOC_TBCTR_U_CMPC) ||
6395 (socSource == EPWM_SOC_TBCTR_U_CMPD) ||
6396 (socSource == EPWM_SOC_TBCTR_D_CMPC) ||
6397 (socSource == EPWM_SOC_TBCTR_D_CMPD))
6398 {
6399 //
6400 // Enable events based on comp C or comp D
6401 //
6402 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETSEL) |= EPWM_ETSEL_SOCASELCMP;
6403 }
6404 else
6405 {
6406 //
6407 // No action required for the other socSource options
6408 //
6409 }
6410 }
6411 else
6412 {
6413 //
6414 // Enable the comparator selection
6415 //
6416 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETSEL) =
6417 ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETSEL) & ~EPWM_ETSEL_SOCBSEL_M) |
6418 (source << EPWM_ETSEL_SOCBSEL_S));
6419
6420 //
6421 // Enable the comparator selection
6422 //
6423 if((socSource == EPWM_SOC_TBCTR_U_CMPA) ||
6424 (socSource == EPWM_SOC_TBCTR_U_CMPB) ||
6425 (socSource == EPWM_SOC_TBCTR_D_CMPA) ||
6426 (socSource == EPWM_SOC_TBCTR_D_CMPB))
6427 {
6428 //
6429 // Enable events based on comp A or comp B
6430 //
6431 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETSEL) &= ~EPWM_ETSEL_SOCBSELCMP;
6432 }
6433 else if((socSource == EPWM_SOC_TBCTR_U_CMPC) ||
6434 (socSource == EPWM_SOC_TBCTR_U_CMPD) ||
6435 (socSource == EPWM_SOC_TBCTR_D_CMPC) ||
6436 (socSource == EPWM_SOC_TBCTR_D_CMPD))
6437 {
6438 //
6439 // Enable events based on comp C or comp D
6440 //
6441 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETSEL) |= EPWM_ETSEL_SOCBSELCMP;
6442 }
6443 else
6444 {
6445 //
6446 // No action required for the other socSource options
6447 //
6448 }
6449 }
6450}
6451//*****************************************************************************
6452//
6472//
6473//*****************************************************************************
6474static inline void
6475EPWM_setADCTriggerEventPrescale(uint32_t base,
6476 EPWM_ADCStartOfConversionType adcSOCType,
6477 uint16_t preScaleCount)
6478{
6479 //
6480 // Check the arguments
6481 //
6482 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
6483 ASSERT(preScaleCount < 16U);
6484
6485 //
6486 // Enable advanced feature of SOC every up to 15 events
6487 //
6488 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETPS) |= EPWM_ETPS_SOCPSSEL;
6489 if(adcSOCType == EPWM_SOC_A)
6490 {
6491 //
6492 // Set the count for SOC A
6493 //
6494 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETSOCPS) =
6495 ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETSOCPS) & ~EPWM_ETSOCPS_SOCAPRD2_M) |
6496 preScaleCount);
6497 }
6498 else
6499 {
6500 //
6501 // Set the count for SOC B
6502 //
6503 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETSOCPS) =
6504 ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETSOCPS) & ~EPWM_ETSOCPS_SOCBPRD2_M) |
6505 (preScaleCount << EPWM_ETSOCPS_SOCBPRD2_S));
6506 }
6507}
6508//*****************************************************************************
6509//
6522//
6523//*****************************************************************************
6524static inline bool
6525EPWM_getADCTriggerFlagStatus(uint32_t base,
6526 EPWM_ADCStartOfConversionType adcSOCType)
6527{
6528 //
6529 // Check the arguments
6530 //
6531 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
6532
6533 //
6534 // Return the SOC A/ B status
6535 //
6536 return((((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETFLG) >>
6537 ((uint16_t)adcSOCType + 2U)) & 0x1U) == 0x1U));
6538}
6539//*****************************************************************************
6540//
6552//
6553//*****************************************************************************
6554static inline void
6555EPWM_clearADCTriggerFlag(uint32_t base,
6556 EPWM_ADCStartOfConversionType adcSOCType)
6557{
6558 //
6559 // Check the arguments
6560 //
6561 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
6562
6563 //
6564 // Clear SOC A/B bit of ETCLR register
6565 //
6566 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETCLR) |= 1U << ((uint16_t)adcSOCType + 2U);
6567}
6568//*****************************************************************************
6569//
6585//
6586//*****************************************************************************
6587static inline void
6588EPWM_enableADCTriggerEventCountInit(uint32_t base,
6589 EPWM_ADCStartOfConversionType adcSOCType)
6590{
6591 //
6592 // Check the arguments
6593 //
6594 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
6595
6596 //
6597 // Enable SOC event count initializing/loading
6598 //
6599 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETCNTINITCTL) |= 1U << ((uint16_t)adcSOCType + 14U);
6600}
6601//*****************************************************************************
6602//
6617//
6618//*****************************************************************************
6619static inline void
6620EPWM_disableADCTriggerEventCountInit(uint32_t base,
6621 EPWM_ADCStartOfConversionType adcSOCType)
6622{
6623 //
6624 // Check the arguments
6625 //
6626 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
6627
6628 //
6629 // Disable SOC event count initializing/loading
6630 //
6631 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETCNTINITCTL) &=
6632 ~(1U << ((uint16_t)adcSOCType + 14U));
6633}
6634//*****************************************************************************
6635//
6648//
6649//*****************************************************************************
6650static inline void
6651EPWM_forceADCTriggerEventCountInit(uint32_t base,
6652 EPWM_ADCStartOfConversionType adcSOCType)
6653{
6654 //
6655 // Check the arguments
6656 //
6657 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
6658
6659 //
6660 // Load the Interrupt Event counter value
6661 //
6662 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETCNTINITCTL) |= 1U << ((uint16_t)adcSOCType + 11U);
6663}
6664
6665//*****************************************************************************
6666//
6680//
6681//*****************************************************************************
6682static inline void
6683EPWM_setADCTriggerEventCountInitValue(uint32_t base,
6684 EPWM_ADCStartOfConversionType adcSOCType,
6685 uint16_t eventCount)
6686{
6687 //
6688 // Check the arguments
6689 //
6690 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
6691 ASSERT(eventCount < 16U);
6692
6693 //
6694 // Set the ADC Trigger event count
6695 //
6696 if(adcSOCType == EPWM_SOC_A)
6697 {
6698 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETCNTINIT) =
6699 ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETCNTINIT) & ~EPWM_ETCNTINIT_SOCAINIT_M) |
6700 (uint16_t)(eventCount << EPWM_ETCNTINIT_SOCAINIT_S));
6701 }
6702 else
6703 {
6704 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETCNTINIT) =
6705 ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETCNTINIT) & ~EPWM_ETCNTINIT_SOCBINIT_M) |
6706 (eventCount << EPWM_ETCNTINIT_SOCBINIT_S));
6707 }
6708}
6709//*****************************************************************************
6710//
6722//
6723//*****************************************************************************
6724static inline uint16_t
6725EPWM_getADCTriggerEventCount(uint32_t base,
6726 EPWM_ADCStartOfConversionType adcSOCType)
6727{
6728 uint16_t eventCount;
6729
6730 //
6731 // Check the arguments
6732 //
6733 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
6734
6735 //
6736 // Return the SOC event count
6737 //
6738 if(adcSOCType == EPWM_SOC_A)
6739 {
6740 eventCount = (HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETSOCPS) >>
6741 EPWM_ETSOCPS_SOCACNT2_S) & 0xFU;
6742 }
6743 else
6744 {
6745 eventCount = (HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETSOCPS) >>
6746 EPWM_ETSOCPS_SOCBCNT2_S) & 0xFU;
6747 }
6748 return(eventCount);
6749}
6750//*****************************************************************************
6751//
6763//
6764//*****************************************************************************
6765static inline void
6766EPWM_forceADCTrigger(uint32_t base, EPWM_ADCStartOfConversionType adcSOCType)
6767{
6768 //
6769 // Check the arguments
6770 //
6771 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
6772
6773 //
6774 // Set SOC A/B bit of ETFRC register
6775 //
6776 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETFRC) |= 1U << ((uint16_t)adcSOCType + 2U);
6777}
6778//
6779// Digital Compare module related APIs
6780//
6781//*****************************************************************************
6782//
6804//
6805//*****************************************************************************
6806static inline void
6807EPWM_selectDigitalCompareTripInput(uint32_t base,
6808 EPWM_DigitalCompareTripInput tripSource,
6809 EPWM_DigitalCompareType dcType)
6810{
6811 //
6812 // Check the arguments
6813 //
6814 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
6815
6816 //
6817 // Set the DC trip input
6818 //
6819
6820 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DCTRIPSEL) =
6821 ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DCTRIPSEL) & ~(0xFU << ((uint16_t)dcType << 2U))) |
6822 ((uint16_t)tripSource << ((uint16_t)dcType << 2U)));
6823
6824}
6825//
6826// DCFILT
6827//
6828//*****************************************************************************
6829//
6837//
6838//*****************************************************************************
6839static inline void
6840EPWM_enableDigitalCompareBlankingWindow(uint32_t base)
6841{
6842 //
6843 // Check the arguments
6844 //
6845 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
6846
6847 //
6848 // Enable DC filter blanking window
6849 //
6850
6851 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DCFCTL) |= EPWM_DCFCTL_BLANKE;
6852
6853}
6854//*****************************************************************************
6855//
6863//
6864//*****************************************************************************
6865static inline void
6866EPWM_disableDigitalCompareBlankingWindow(uint32_t base)
6867{
6868 //
6869 // Check the arguments
6870 //
6871 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
6872
6873 //
6874 // Disable DC filter blanking window
6875 //
6876
6877 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DCFCTL) &= ~EPWM_DCFCTL_BLANKE;
6878
6879}
6880//*****************************************************************************
6881//
6890//
6891//*****************************************************************************
6892static inline void
6893EPWM_enableDigitalCompareWindowInverseMode(uint32_t base)
6894{
6895 //
6896 // Check the arguments
6897 //
6898 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
6899
6900 //
6901 // Enable DC window inverse mode.
6902 //
6903
6904 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DCFCTL) |= EPWM_DCFCTL_BLANKINV;
6905
6906}
6907//*****************************************************************************
6908//
6916//
6917//*****************************************************************************
6918static inline void
6919EPWM_disableDigitalCompareWindowInverseMode(uint32_t base)
6920{
6921 //
6922 // Check the arguments
6923 //
6924 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
6925
6926 //
6927 // Disable DC window inverse mode.
6928 //
6929
6930 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DCFCTL) &= ~EPWM_DCFCTL_BLANKINV;
6931
6932}
6933//*****************************************************************************
6934//
6950//
6951//*****************************************************************************
6952static inline void
6953EPWM_setDigitalCompareBlankingEvent(uint32_t base,
6954 EPWM_DigitalCompareBlankingPulse blankingPulse)
6955{
6956 //
6957 // Check the arguments
6958 //
6959 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
6960
6961 //
6962 // Set DC blanking event
6963 //
6964
6965 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DCFCTL) =
6966 ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DCFCTL) & ~EPWM_DCFCTL_PULSESEL_M) |
6967 ((uint16_t)((uint32_t)blankingPulse << EPWM_DCFCTL_PULSESEL_S)));
6968
6969}
6970//*****************************************************************************
6971//
6986//
6987//*****************************************************************************
6988static inline void
6989EPWM_setDigitalCompareFilterInput(uint32_t base,
6990 EPWM_DigitalCompareFilterInput filterInput)
6991{
6992 //
6993 // Check the arguments
6994 //
6995 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
6996
6997 //
6998 // Set the signal source that will be filtered
6999 //
7000
7001 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DCFCTL) =
7002 ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DCFCTL) & ~EPWM_DCFCTL_SRCSEL_M) |
7003 ((uint16_t)filterInput));
7004
7005}
7006//
7007// DC Edge Filter
7008//
7009//*****************************************************************************
7010//
7019//
7020//*****************************************************************************
7021static inline void
7022EPWM_enableDigitalCompareEdgeFilter(uint32_t base)
7023{
7024 //
7025 // Check the arguments
7026 //
7027 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
7028
7029 //
7030 // Enable DC Edge Filter
7031 //
7032
7033 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DCFCTL) |= EPWM_DCFCTL_EDGEFILTSEL;
7034
7035}
7036//*****************************************************************************
7037//
7045//
7046//*****************************************************************************
7047static inline void
7048EPWM_disableDigitalCompareEdgeFilter(uint32_t base)
7049{
7050 //
7051 // Check the arguments
7052 //
7053 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
7054
7055 //
7056 // Disable DC Edge Filter
7057 //
7058
7059 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DCFCTL) &= ~EPWM_DCFCTL_EDGEFILTSEL;
7060
7061}
7062
7063//*****************************************************************************
7064//
7077//
7078//*****************************************************************************
7079static inline void
7080EPWM_setDigitalCompareEdgeFilterMode(uint32_t base,
7081 EPWM_DigitalCompareEdgeFilterMode edgeMode)
7082{
7083 //
7084 // Check the arguments
7085 //
7086 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
7087
7088 //
7089 // Set DC Edge filter mode
7090 //
7091
7092 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DCFCTL) =
7093 (HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DCFCTL) & ~EPWM_DCFCTL_EDGEMODE_M) |
7094 ((uint16_t)edgeMode << EPWM_DCFCTL_EDGEMODE_S);
7095
7096}
7097
7098//*****************************************************************************
7099//
7117//
7118//*****************************************************************************
7119static inline void
7120EPWM_setDigitalCompareEdgeFilterEdgeCount(uint32_t base, uint16_t edgeCount)
7121{
7122 //
7123 // Check the arguments
7124 //
7125 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
7126
7127 //
7128 // Set DC Edge filter edge count
7129 //
7130
7131 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DCFCTL) = (HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DCFCTL) &
7132 ~EPWM_DCFCTL_EDGECOUNT_M) |
7133 (edgeCount << EPWM_DCFCTL_EDGECOUNT_S);
7134
7135}
7136//*****************************************************************************
7137//
7146//
7147//*****************************************************************************
7148static inline uint16_t
7149EPWM_getDigitalCompareEdgeFilterEdgeCount(uint32_t base)
7150{
7151 //
7152 // Check the arguments
7153 //
7154 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
7155
7156 //
7157 // Return configured DC edge filter edge count
7158 //
7159 return((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DCFCTL) & EPWM_DCFCTL_EDGECOUNT_M) >>
7160 EPWM_DCFCTL_EDGECOUNT_S);
7161}
7162//*****************************************************************************
7163//
7172//
7173//*****************************************************************************
7174static inline uint16_t
7175EPWM_getDigitalCompareEdgeFilterEdgeStatus(uint32_t base)
7176{
7177 //
7178 // Check the arguments
7179 //
7180 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
7181
7182 //
7183 // Return captured edge count by DC Edge filter
7184 //
7185 return((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DCFCTL) & EPWM_DCFCTL_EDGESTATUS_M) >>
7186 EPWM_DCFCTL_EDGESTATUS_S);
7187}
7188//*****************************************************************************
7189//
7200//
7201//*****************************************************************************
7202static inline void
7203EPWM_setDigitalCompareWindowOffset(uint32_t base, uint16_t windowOffsetCount)
7204{
7205 //
7206 // Check the arguments
7207 //
7208 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
7209
7210 //
7211 // Set the blanking window offset in TBCLK counts
7212 //
7213 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DCFOFFSET) = windowOffsetCount;
7214}
7215//*****************************************************************************
7216//
7226//
7227//*****************************************************************************
7228static inline void
7229EPWM_setDigitalCompareWindowLength(uint32_t base, uint16_t windowLengthCount)
7230{
7231 //
7232 // Check the arguments
7233 //
7234 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
7235
7236 //
7237 // Set the blanking window length in TBCLK counts
7238 //
7239 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DCFWINDOW) = windowLengthCount;
7240}
7241//*****************************************************************************
7242//
7250//
7251//*****************************************************************************
7252static inline uint16_t
7253EPWM_getDigitalCompareBlankingWindowOffsetCount(uint32_t base)
7254{
7255 //
7256 // Check the arguments
7257 //
7258 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
7259
7260 //
7261 // Return the Blanking Window Offset count
7262 //
7263 return(HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DCFOFFSETCNT));
7264}
7265//*****************************************************************************
7266//
7274//
7275//*****************************************************************************
7276static inline uint16_t
7277EPWM_getDigitalCompareBlankingWindowLengthCount(uint32_t base)
7278{
7279 //
7280 // Check the arguments
7281 //
7282 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
7283
7284 //
7285 // Return the Blanking Window Length count
7286 //
7287 return(HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DCFWINDOWCNT));
7288}
7289//*****************************************************************************
7290//
7316//
7317//*****************************************************************************
7318static inline void
7319EPWM_setDigitalCompareEventSource(uint32_t base,
7320 EPWM_DigitalCompareModule dcModule,
7321 EPWM_DigitalCompareEvent dcEvent,
7322 EPWM_DigitalCompareEventSource dcEventSource)
7323{
7324 uint32_t registerOffset;
7325
7326 //
7327 // Check the arguments
7328 //
7329 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
7330
7331 registerOffset = EPWM_O_DCACTL + (uint32_t)dcModule * 2U;
7332
7333 //
7334 // Set the DC event 1 source source
7335 //
7336
7337 if(dcEvent == EPWM_DC_EVENT_1)
7338 {
7339 HWREGH(base + registerOffset) =
7340 ((HWREGH(base + registerOffset) & ~EPWM_DCACTL_EVT1SRCSEL) |
7341 (uint16_t)dcEventSource);
7342 }
7343 else
7344 {
7345 HWREGH(base + registerOffset) =
7346 ((HWREGH(base + registerOffset) & ~EPWM_DCACTL_EVT2SRCSEL) |
7347 ((uint16_t)dcEventSource << 8U));
7348 }
7349
7350}
7351//*****************************************************************************
7352//
7375//
7376//*****************************************************************************
7377static inline void
7378EPWM_setDigitalCompareEventSyncMode(uint32_t base,
7379 EPWM_DigitalCompareModule dcModule,
7380 EPWM_DigitalCompareEvent dcEvent,
7381 EPWM_DigitalCompareSyncMode syncMode)
7382{
7383 uint32_t registerOffset;
7384
7385 //
7386 // Check the arguments
7387 //
7388 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
7389
7390 registerOffset = EPWM_O_DCACTL + (uint32_t)dcModule * 2U;
7391
7392 //
7393 // Set the DC event sync mode
7394 //
7395
7396 if(dcEvent == EPWM_DC_EVENT_1)
7397 {
7398 HWREGH(base + registerOffset) =
7399 ((HWREGH(base + registerOffset) & ~EPWM_DCACTL_EVT1FRCSYNCSEL) |
7400 ((uint16_t)syncMode << 1U));
7401 }
7402 else
7403 {
7404 HWREGH(base + registerOffset) =
7405 ((HWREGH(base + registerOffset) & ~EPWM_DCACTL_EVT2FRCSYNCSEL) |
7406 ((uint16_t)syncMode << 9U));
7407 }
7408
7409}
7410
7411//*****************************************************************************
7412//
7425//
7426//*****************************************************************************
7427static inline void
7428EPWM_enableDigitalCompareADCTrigger(uint32_t base,
7429 EPWM_DigitalCompareModule dcModule)
7430{
7431 uint32_t registerOffset;
7432
7433 //
7434 // Check the arguments
7435 //
7436 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
7437
7438 registerOffset = EPWM_O_DCACTL + (uint32_t)dcModule * 2U;
7439
7440 //
7441 // Enable Digital Compare start of conversion generation
7442 //
7443
7444 HWREGH(base + registerOffset) =
7445 (HWREGH(base + registerOffset) | EPWM_DCACTL_EVT1SOCE);
7446
7447}
7448//*****************************************************************************
7449//
7462//
7463//*****************************************************************************
7464static inline void
7465EPWM_disableDigitalCompareADCTrigger(uint32_t base,
7466 EPWM_DigitalCompareModule dcModule)
7467{
7468 uint32_t registerOffset;
7469
7470 //
7471 // Check the arguments
7472 //
7473 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
7474
7475 registerOffset = EPWM_O_DCACTL + (uint32_t)dcModule * 2U;
7476
7477 //
7478 // Disable Digital Compare start of conversion generation
7479 //
7480
7481 HWREGH(base + registerOffset) =
7482 (HWREGH(base + registerOffset) & ~EPWM_DCACTL_EVT1SOCE);
7483
7484}
7485//*****************************************************************************
7486//
7499//
7500//*****************************************************************************
7501static inline void
7502EPWM_enableDigitalCompareSyncEvent(uint32_t base,
7503 EPWM_DigitalCompareModule dcModule)
7504{
7505 uint32_t registerOffset;
7506
7507 //
7508 // Check the arguments
7509 //
7510 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
7511
7512 registerOffset = EPWM_O_DCACTL + (uint32_t)dcModule * 2U;
7513
7514 //
7515 // Enable Digital Compare sync out pulse generation
7516 //
7517
7518 HWREGH(base + registerOffset) =
7519 (HWREGH(base + registerOffset) | EPWM_DCACTL_EVT1SYNCE);
7520
7521}
7522//*****************************************************************************
7523//
7536//
7537//*****************************************************************************
7538static inline void
7539EPWM_disableDigitalCompareSyncEvent(uint32_t base,
7540 EPWM_DigitalCompareModule dcModule)
7541{
7542 uint32_t registerOffset;
7543
7544 //
7545 // Check the arguments
7546 //
7547 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
7548
7549 registerOffset = EPWM_O_DCACTL + (uint32_t)dcModule * 2U;
7550
7551 //
7552 // Disable Digital Compare sync out pulse generation
7553 //
7554
7555 HWREGH(base + registerOffset) =
7556 (HWREGH(base + registerOffset) & ~EPWM_DCACTL_EVT1SYNCE);
7557
7558}
7559//*****************************************************************************
7560//
7581//
7582//*****************************************************************************
7583static inline void
7584EPWM_setDigitalCompareCBCLatchMode(uint32_t base,
7585 EPWM_DigitalCompareModule dcModule,
7586 EPWM_DigitalCompareEvent dcEvent,
7587 EPWM_DigitalCompareCBCLatchMode latchMode)
7588{
7589 uint32_t registerOffset;
7590
7591 //
7592 // Check the arguments
7593 //
7594 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
7595
7596 registerOffset = EPWM_O_DCACTL + (uint32_t)dcModule * 2U;
7597
7598 //
7599 // Set the DC CBC Latch Mode
7600 //
7601
7602 if(dcEvent == EPWM_DC_EVENT_1)
7603 {
7604 HWREGH(base + registerOffset) =
7605 ((HWREGH(base + registerOffset) & ~EPWM_DCACTL_EVT1LATSEL) |
7606 ((uint16_t)latchMode << 4U));
7607 }
7608 else
7609 {
7610 HWREGH(base + registerOffset) =
7611 ((HWREGH(base + registerOffset) & ~EPWM_DCACTL_EVT2LATSEL) |
7612 ((uint16_t)latchMode << 12U));
7613 }
7614
7615}
7616//*****************************************************************************
7617//
7643//
7644//*****************************************************************************
7645static inline void
7646EPWM_selectDigitalCompareCBCLatchClearEvent(uint32_t base,
7647 EPWM_DigitalCompareModule dcModule,
7648 EPWM_DigitalCompareEvent dcEvent,
7649 EPWM_DigitalCompareCBCLatchClearEvent clearEvent)
7650{
7651 uint32_t registerOffset;
7652
7653 //
7654 // Check the arguments
7655 //
7656 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
7657
7658 registerOffset = EPWM_O_DCACTL + (uint32_t)dcModule * 2U;
7659
7660 //
7661 // Set the DC CBC Latch Clear Event
7662 //
7663
7664 if(dcEvent == EPWM_DC_EVENT_1)
7665 {
7666 HWREGH(base + registerOffset) =
7667 ((HWREGH(base + registerOffset) & ~EPWM_DCACTL_EVT1LATCLRSEL_M) |
7668 ((uint16_t)clearEvent << EPWM_DCACTL_EVT1LATCLRSEL_S));
7669 }
7670 else
7671 {
7672 HWREGH(base + registerOffset) =
7673 ((HWREGH(base + registerOffset) & ~EPWM_DCACTL_EVT2LATCLRSEL_M) |
7674 ((uint16_t)clearEvent << EPWM_DCACTL_EVT2LATCLRSEL_S));
7675 }
7676
7677}
7678//*****************************************************************************
7679//
7699//
7700//*****************************************************************************
7701static inline bool
7702EPWM_getDigitalCompareCBCLatchStatus(uint32_t base,
7703 EPWM_DigitalCompareModule dcModule,
7704 EPWM_DigitalCompareEvent dcEvent)
7705{
7706 uint32_t registerOffset;
7707 uint16_t status;
7708
7709 //
7710 // Check the arguments
7711 //
7712 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
7713
7714 registerOffset = EPWM_O_DCACTL + (uint32_t)dcModule * 2U;
7715
7716 //
7717 // Get DC CBC Latch Clear Event
7718 //
7719 if(dcEvent == EPWM_DC_EVENT_1)
7720 {
7721 status = HWREGH(base + registerOffset) & EPWM_DCACTL_EVT1LAT;
7722 }
7723 else
7724 {
7725 status = HWREGH(base + registerOffset) & EPWM_DCACTL_EVT2LAT;
7726 }
7727 return(status != 0U);
7728}
7729//
7730// DC capture mode
7731//
7732//*****************************************************************************
7733//
7741//
7742//*****************************************************************************
7743static inline void
7744EPWM_enableDigitalCompareCounterCapture(uint32_t base)
7745{
7746 //
7747 // Check the arguments
7748 //
7749 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
7750
7751 //
7752 // Enable Time base counter capture
7753 //
7754
7755 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DCCAPCTL) |= EPWM_DCCAPCTL_CAPE;
7756
7757}
7758//*****************************************************************************
7759//
7767//
7768//*****************************************************************************
7769static inline void
7770EPWM_disableDigitalCompareCounterCapture(uint32_t base)
7771{
7772 //
7773 // Check the arguments
7774 //
7775 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
7776
7777 //
7778 // Disable Time base counter capture
7779 //
7780
7781 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DCCAPCTL) &= ~EPWM_DCCAPCTL_CAPE;
7782
7783}
7784//*****************************************************************************
7785//
7797//
7798//*****************************************************************************
7799static inline void
7800EPWM_setDigitalCompareCounterShadowMode(uint32_t base, bool enableShadowMode)
7801{
7802 //
7803 // Check the arguments
7804 //
7805 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
7806
7807
7808 if(enableShadowMode)
7809 {
7810 //
7811 // Enable DC counter shadow mode
7812 //
7813 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DCCAPCTL) &= ~EPWM_DCCAPCTL_SHDWMODE;
7814 }
7815 else
7816 {
7817 //
7818 // Disable DC counter shadow mode
7819 //
7820 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DCCAPCTL) |= EPWM_DCCAPCTL_SHDWMODE;
7821 }
7822
7823}
7824//*****************************************************************************
7825//
7836//
7837//*****************************************************************************
7838static inline bool
7839EPWM_getDigitalCompareCaptureStatus(uint32_t base)
7840{
7841 //
7842 // Check the arguments
7843 //
7844 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
7845
7846 //
7847 // Return the DC compare status
7848 //
7849 return((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DCCAPCTL) & EPWM_DCCAPCTL_CAPSTS) ==
7850 EPWM_DCCAPCTL_CAPSTS);
7851}
7852
7853//*****************************************************************************
7854//
7868//*****************************************************************************
7869static inline void
7870EPWM_configureDigitalCompareCounterCaptureMode(uint32_t base,
7871 bool disableClearMode)
7872{
7873 //
7874 // Check the arguments
7875 //
7876 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
7877
7878 if(disableClearMode)
7879 {
7880 //
7881 // Disable DC counter auto-clear on PULSESEL event
7882 //
7883 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DCCAPCTL) |= EPWM_DCCAPCTL_CAPMODE;
7884 }
7885 else
7886 {
7887 //
7888 // Enable DC counter clear on PULSESEL events
7889 //
7890 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DCCAPCTL) &= ~EPWM_DCCAPCTL_CAPMODE;
7891 }
7892}
7893
7894//*****************************************************************************
7895//
7902//*****************************************************************************
7903static inline void
7904EPWM_clearDigitalCompareCaptureStatusFlag(uint32_t base)
7905{
7906 //
7907 // Check the arguments
7908 //
7909 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
7910
7911 //
7912 // Clear digital compare capture status flag
7913 //
7914
7915 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DCCAPCTL) |= EPWM_DCCAPCTL_CAPCLR;
7916}
7917//*****************************************************************************
7918//
7928//
7929//*****************************************************************************
7930static inline uint16_t
7931EPWM_getDigitalCompareCaptureCount(uint32_t base)
7932{
7933 //
7934 // Check the arguments
7935 //
7936 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
7937
7938 //
7939 // Return the DC Time Base Counter Capture count value
7940 //
7941 return(HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DCCAP));
7942}
7943//*****************************************************************************
7944//
7962//
7963//*****************************************************************************
7964static inline void
7965EPWM_enableDigitalCompareTripCombinationInput(uint32_t base,
7966 uint16_t tripInput,
7967 EPWM_DigitalCompareType dcType)
7968{
7969 uint32_t registerOffset;
7970
7971 //
7972 // Check the arguments
7973 //
7974 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
7975
7976 //
7977 // Get the DCAHTRIPSEL, DCALTRIPSEL, DCBHTRIPSEL, DCBLTRIPSEL register
7978 // offset with respect to DCAHTRIPSEL
7979 //
7980 registerOffset = EPWM_O_DCAHTRIPSEL + (uint32_t)dcType * 2U;
7981
7982 //
7983 // Set the DC trip input
7984 //
7985
7986 HWREGH(base + registerOffset) =
7987 (HWREGH(base + registerOffset) | tripInput);
7988
7989 //
7990 // Enable the combination input
7991 //
7992 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DCTRIPSEL) =
7993 (HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DCTRIPSEL) | (0xFU << ((uint16_t)dcType << 2U))); // gives 0,4,8 and 12
7994
7995}
7996//*****************************************************************************
7997//
8015//
8016//*****************************************************************************
8017static inline void
8018EPWM_disableDigitalCompareTripCombinationInput(uint32_t base,
8019 uint16_t tripInput,
8020 EPWM_DigitalCompareType dcType)
8021{
8022 uint32_t registerOffset;
8023
8024 //
8025 // Check the arguments
8026 //
8027 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
8028
8029 //
8030 // Get the DCAHTRIPSEL, DCALTRIPSEL, DCBHTRIPSEL, DCBLTRIPSEL register
8031 // offset with respect to DCAHTRIPSEL
8032 //
8033 registerOffset = EPWM_O_DCAHTRIPSEL + (uint32_t)dcType * 2U;
8034
8035 //
8036 // Set the DC trip input
8037 //
8038
8039 HWREGH(base + registerOffset) =
8040 (HWREGH(base + registerOffset) & ~tripInput);
8041
8042}
8043//
8044// Event capture mode
8045//
8046//*****************************************************************************
8047//
8056//
8057//*****************************************************************************
8058static inline void
8059EPWM_enableCaptureInEvent(uint32_t base)
8060{
8061 //
8062 // Check the arguments
8063 //
8064 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
8065
8066 //
8067 // Enables CAPIN.sync signal
8068 //
8069
8070 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_CAPCTL) |= EPWM_CAPCTL_SRCSEL;
8071
8072}
8073//*****************************************************************************
8074//
8083//
8084//*****************************************************************************
8085static inline void
8086EPWM_disableCaptureInEvent(uint32_t base)
8087{
8088 //
8089 // Check the arguments
8090 //
8091 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
8092
8093 //
8094 // Disables CAPIN.sync signal
8095 //
8096
8097 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_CAPCTL) &= ~EPWM_CAPCTL_SRCSEL;
8098
8099}
8100//*****************************************************************************
8101//
8115//
8116//*****************************************************************************
8117static inline void
8118EPWM_configCaptureGateInputPolarity(uint32_t base,
8119 EPWM_selectCaptureGateInputPolarity polSel)
8120{
8121 //
8122 // Check the arguments
8123 //
8124 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
8125
8126 //
8127 // Configures polarity for CAPGATE
8128 //
8129
8130 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_CAPCTL) =
8131 ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_CAPCTL) & ~EPWM_CAPCTL_CAPGATEPOL_M) |
8132 ((uint32_t)polSel << EPWM_CAPCTL_CAPGATEPOL_S));
8133
8134}
8135//*****************************************************************************
8136//
8148//
8149//*****************************************************************************
8150static inline void
8151EPWM_invertCaptureInputPolarity(uint32_t base,
8152 EPWM_selectCaptureInputPolarity polSel)
8153{
8154 //
8155 // Check the arguments
8156 //
8157 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
8158
8159 //
8160 // Configures polarity for Capture Input
8161 //
8162
8163 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_CAPCTL) =
8164 ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_CAPCTL) & ~EPWM_CAPCTL_CAPINPOL) |
8165 ((uint32_t)polSel << 3U));
8166
8167}
8168//*****************************************************************************
8169//
8177//
8178//*****************************************************************************
8179static inline void
8180EPWM_enableIndependentPulseLogic(uint32_t base)
8181{
8182 //
8183 // Check the arguments
8184 //
8185 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
8186
8187 //
8188 // Configures polarity for Capture Input
8189 //
8190
8191 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_CAPCTL) |= EPWM_CAPCTL_PULSECTL;
8192
8193}
8194//*****************************************************************************
8195//
8204//
8205//*****************************************************************************
8206static inline void
8207EPWM_disableIndependentPulseLogic(uint32_t base)
8208{
8209 //
8210 // Check the arguments
8211 //
8212 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
8213
8214 //
8215 // Configures polarity for Capture Input
8216 //
8217
8218 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_CAPCTL) &= ~EPWM_CAPCTL_PULSECTL;
8219
8220}
8221//*****************************************************************************
8222//
8230//
8231//*****************************************************************************
8232static inline void
8233EPWM_forceCaptureEventLoad(uint32_t base)
8234{
8235 //
8236 // Check the arguments
8237 //
8238 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
8239
8240 //
8241 // Force a Capture Event Load
8242 //
8243
8244 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_CAPCTL) |= EPWM_CAPCTL_FRCLOAD;
8245
8246}
8247//*****************************************************************************
8248//
8268//
8269//*****************************************************************************
8270static inline void
8271EPWM_selectCaptureTripInput(uint32_t base,
8272 EPWM_DigitalCompareTripInput tripSource,
8273 EPWM_CaptureInputType dcType)
8274{
8275 //
8276 // Check the arguments
8277 //
8278 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
8279
8280 //
8281 // Set the Capture trip input
8282 //
8283
8284 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_CAPTRIPSEL) =
8285 ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_CAPTRIPSEL) & ~(0xFU << ((uint16_t)dcType << 2U))) |
8286 ((uint16_t)tripSource << ((uint16_t)dcType << 2U)));
8287
8288}
8289//*****************************************************************************
8290//
8306//
8307//*****************************************************************************
8308static inline void
8309EPWM_enableCaptureTripCombinationInput(uint32_t base,
8310 uint16_t tripInput,
8311 EPWM_CaptureInputType dcType)
8312{
8313 uint32_t registerOffset;
8314
8315 //
8316 // Check the arguments
8317 //
8318 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
8319 registerOffset = EPWM_O_CAPGATETRIPSEL + (1U - (uint32_t)dcType) * 2U;
8320
8321 //
8322 // Set the capture trip input
8323 //
8324
8325 HWREGH(base + registerOffset) =
8326 (HWREGH(base + registerOffset) | tripInput);
8327
8328 //
8329 // Enable the combination input
8330 //
8331 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_CAPTRIPSEL) =
8332 (HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_CAPTRIPSEL) | (0xFU << ((uint16_t)dcType << 2U)));
8333
8334}
8335//*****************************************************************************
8336//
8352//
8353//*****************************************************************************
8354static inline void
8355EPWM_disableCaptureTripCombinationInput(uint32_t base,
8356 uint16_t tripInput,
8357 EPWM_CaptureInputType dcType)
8358{
8359 uint32_t registerOffset;
8360
8361 //
8362 // Check the arguments
8363 //
8364 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
8365 registerOffset = EPWM_O_CAPGATETRIPSEL + (1U - (uint32_t)dcType) * 2U;
8366
8367 //
8368 // Set the capture trip input
8369 //
8370
8371 HWREGH(base + registerOffset) =
8372 (HWREGH(base + registerOffset) & ~tripInput);
8373
8374}
8375//
8376// Valley switching
8377//
8378//*****************************************************************************
8379//
8387//
8388//*****************************************************************************
8389static inline void
8390EPWM_enableValleyCapture(uint32_t base)
8391{
8392 //
8393 // Check the arguments
8394 //
8395 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
8396
8397 //
8398 // Set VCAPE bit
8399 //
8400
8401 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_VCAPCTL) |= EPWM_VCAPCTL_VCAPE;
8402
8403}
8404//*****************************************************************************
8405//
8413//
8414//*****************************************************************************
8415static inline void
8416EPWM_disableValleyCapture(uint32_t base)
8417{
8418 //
8419 // Check the arguments
8420 //
8421 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
8422
8423 //
8424 // Clear VCAPE bit
8425 //
8426
8427 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_VCAPCTL) &= ~EPWM_VCAPCTL_VCAPE;
8428
8429}
8430//*****************************************************************************
8431//
8443//
8444//*****************************************************************************
8445static inline void
8446EPWM_startValleyCapture(uint32_t base)
8447{
8448 //
8449 // Check the arguments
8450 //
8451 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
8452
8453 //
8454 // Set VCAPSTART bit
8455 //
8456
8457 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_VCAPCTL) |= EPWM_VCAPCTL_VCAPSTART;
8458
8459}
8460//*****************************************************************************
8461//
8473//
8474//*****************************************************************************
8475static inline void
8476EPWM_setValleyTriggerSource(uint32_t base, EPWM_ValleyTriggerSource trigger)
8477{
8478 //
8479 // Check the arguments
8480 //
8481 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
8482
8483 //
8484 // Write to TRIGSEL bits
8485 //
8486
8487 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_VCAPCTL) =
8488 ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_VCAPCTL) & ~EPWM_VCAPCTL_TRIGSEL_M) |
8489 ((uint16_t)trigger << 2U));
8490
8491}
8492//*****************************************************************************
8493//
8510//
8511//*****************************************************************************
8512static inline void
8513EPWM_setValleyTriggerEdgeCounts(uint32_t base, uint16_t startCount,
8514 uint16_t stopCount)
8515{
8516 //
8517 // Check the arguments
8518 //
8519 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
8520 ASSERT((startCount < 16U) && (stopCount < 16U));
8521
8522 //
8523 // Write to STARTEDGE and STOPEDGE bits
8524 //
8525
8526 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_VCNTCFG) =
8527 ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_VCNTCFG) &
8528 ~(EPWM_VCNTCFG_STARTEDGE_M | EPWM_VCNTCFG_STOPEDGE_M)) |
8529 (startCount | (stopCount << 8U)));
8530
8531}
8532//*****************************************************************************
8533//
8541//
8542//*****************************************************************************
8543static inline void
8544EPWM_enableValleyHWDelay(uint32_t base)
8545{
8546 //
8547 // Check the arguments
8548 //
8549 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
8550
8551 //
8552 // Set EDGEFILTDLYSEL bit
8553 //
8554
8555 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_VCAPCTL) |= EPWM_VCAPCTL_EDGEFILTDLYSEL;
8556
8557}
8558//*****************************************************************************
8559//
8567//
8568//*****************************************************************************
8569static inline void
8570EPWM_disableValleyHWDelay(uint32_t base)
8571{
8572 //
8573 // Check the arguments
8574 //
8575 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
8576
8577 //
8578 // Clear EDGEFILTDLYSEL bit
8579 //
8580
8581 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_VCAPCTL) &= ~EPWM_VCAPCTL_EDGEFILTDLYSEL;
8582
8583}
8584//*****************************************************************************
8585//
8594//
8595//*****************************************************************************
8596static inline void
8597EPWM_setValleySWDelayValue(uint32_t base, uint16_t delayOffsetValue)
8598{
8599 //
8600 // Check the arguments
8601 //
8602 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
8603
8604 //
8605 // Write to SWVDELVAL bits
8606 //
8607 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_SWVDELVAL) = delayOffsetValue;
8608}
8609//*****************************************************************************
8610//
8619//
8620//*****************************************************************************
8621static inline void
8622EPWM_setValleyDelayDivider(uint32_t base, EPWM_ValleyDelayMode delayMode)
8623{
8624 //
8625 // Check the arguments
8626 //
8627 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
8628
8629 //
8630 // Write to VDELAYDIV bits
8631 //
8632
8633 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_VCAPCTL) =
8634 ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_VCAPCTL) & ~EPWM_VCAPCTL_VDELAYDIV_M) |
8635 ((uint16_t)delayMode << 7U));
8636
8637}
8638//*****************************************************************************
8639//
8652//
8653//*****************************************************************************
8654static inline bool
8655EPWM_getValleyEdgeStatus(uint32_t base, EPWM_ValleyCounterEdge edge)
8656{
8657 //
8658 // Check the arguments
8659 //
8660 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
8661
8662 if(edge == EPWM_VALLEY_COUNT_START_EDGE)
8663 {
8664 //
8665 // Returns STARTEDGESTS status
8666 //
8667 return(((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_VCNTCFG) & EPWM_VCNTCFG_STARTEDGESTS) ==
8668 EPWM_VCNTCFG_STARTEDGESTS));
8669 }
8670 else
8671 {
8672 //
8673 // Returns STOPEDGESTS status
8674 //
8675 return(((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_VCNTCFG) & EPWM_VCNTCFG_STOPEDGESTS) ==
8676 EPWM_VCNTCFG_STOPEDGESTS));
8677 }
8678}
8679//*****************************************************************************
8680//
8691//
8692//*****************************************************************************
8693static inline uint16_t
8694EPWM_getValleyCount(uint32_t base)
8695{
8696 //
8697 // Check the arguments
8698 //
8699 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
8700
8701 //
8702 // Read VCNTVAL register
8703 //
8704 return(HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_VCNTVAL));
8705}
8706//*****************************************************************************
8707//
8715//
8716//*****************************************************************************
8717static inline uint16_t
8718EPWM_getValleyHWDelay(uint32_t base)
8719{
8720 //
8721 // Check the arguments
8722 //
8723 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
8724
8725 //
8726 // Read HWVDELVAL register
8727 //
8728 return(HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_HWVDELVAL));
8729}
8730//*****************************************************************************
8731//
8741//
8742//*****************************************************************************
8743static inline void
8744EPWM_enableGlobalLoad(uint32_t base)
8745{
8746 //
8747 // Check the arguments
8748 //
8749 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
8750
8751 //
8752 // Shadow to active load is controlled globally
8753 //
8754
8755 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_GLDCTL) |= EPWM_GLDCTL_GLD;
8756
8757}
8758//*****************************************************************************
8759//
8768//
8769//*****************************************************************************
8770static inline void
8771EPWM_disableGlobalLoad(uint32_t base)
8772{
8773 //
8774 // Check the arguments
8775 //
8776 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
8777
8778 //
8779 // Shadow to active load is controlled individually
8780 //
8781
8782 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_GLDCTL) &= ~EPWM_GLDCTL_GLD;
8783
8784}
8785//*****************************************************************************
8786//
8820//
8821//*****************************************************************************
8822static inline void
8823EPWM_setGlobalLoadTrigger(uint32_t base, EPWM_GlobalLoadTrigger loadTrigger)
8824{
8825 //
8826 // Check the arguments
8827 //
8828 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
8829
8830 //
8831 // Set the Global shadow to active load pulse
8832 //
8833
8834 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_GLDCTL) =
8835 ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_GLDCTL) & ~EPWM_GLDCTL_GLDMODE_M) |
8836 ((uint16_t)loadTrigger << EPWM_GLDCTL_GLDMODE_S));
8837
8838}
8839//*****************************************************************************
8840//
8852//
8853//*****************************************************************************
8854static inline void
8855EPWM_setGlobalLoadEventPrescale(uint32_t base, uint16_t prescalePulseCount)
8856{
8857 //
8858 // Check the arguments
8859 //
8860 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
8861 ASSERT(prescalePulseCount < 8U);
8862
8863 //
8864 // Set the number of counts that have to occur before
8865 // a load strobe is issued
8866 //
8867
8868 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_GLDCTL) =
8869 ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_GLDCTL) & ~EPWM_GLDCTL_GLDPRD_M) |
8870 (prescalePulseCount << EPWM_GLDCTL_GLDPRD_S));
8871
8872}
8873//*****************************************************************************
8874//
8884//
8885//*****************************************************************************
8886static inline uint16_t
8887EPWM_getGlobalLoadEventCount(uint32_t base)
8888{
8889 //
8890 // Check the arguments
8891 //
8892 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
8893
8894 //
8895 // Return the number of events that have occurred
8896 //
8897 return((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_GLDCTL) >> EPWM_GLDCTL_GLDCNT_S) & 0x7U);
8898}
8899//*****************************************************************************
8900//
8910//
8911//*****************************************************************************
8912static inline void
8913EPWM_disableGlobalLoadOneShotMode(uint32_t base)
8914{
8915 //
8916 // Check the arguments
8917 //
8918 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
8919
8920 //
8921 // Enable global continuous shadow to active load
8922 //
8923
8924 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_GLDCTL) &= ~EPWM_GLDCTL_OSHTMODE;
8925
8926}
8927//*****************************************************************************
8928//
8938//
8939//*****************************************************************************
8940static inline void
8941EPWM_enableGlobalLoadOneShotMode(uint32_t base)
8942{
8943 //
8944 // Check the arguments
8945 //
8946 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
8947
8948 //
8949 // Enable global continuous shadow to active load
8950 //
8951
8952 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_GLDCTL) |= EPWM_GLDCTL_OSHTMODE;
8953
8954}
8955//*****************************************************************************
8956//
8966//
8967//*****************************************************************************
8968static inline void
8969EPWM_setGlobalLoadOneShotLatch(uint32_t base)
8970{
8971 //
8972 // Check the arguments
8973 //
8974 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
8975
8976 //
8977 // Set a one shot Global shadow load pulse.
8978 //
8979
8980 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_GLDCTL2) |= EPWM_GLDCTL2_OSHTLD;
8981
8982}
8983//*****************************************************************************
8984//
8993//
8994//*****************************************************************************
8995static inline void
8996EPWM_forceGlobalLoadOneShotEvent(uint32_t base)
8997{
8998 //
8999 // Check the arguments
9000 //
9001 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
9002
9003 //
9004 // Force a Software Global shadow load pulse
9005 //
9006
9007 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_GLDCTL2) |= EPWM_GLDCTL2_GFRCLD;
9008
9009}
9010//*****************************************************************************
9011//
9033//
9034//*****************************************************************************
9035static inline void
9036EPWM_enableGlobalLoadRegisters(uint32_t base, uint16_t loadRegister)
9037{
9038 //
9039 // Check the arguments
9040 //
9041 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
9042 ASSERT((loadRegister > 0x0000U) && (loadRegister < 0x0800U));
9043
9044 //
9045 // The register specified by loadRegister is loaded globally
9046 //
9047
9048 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_GLDCFG) |= loadRegister;
9049
9050}
9051//*****************************************************************************
9052//
9075//
9076//*****************************************************************************
9077static inline void
9078EPWM_disableGlobalLoadRegisters(uint32_t base, uint16_t loadRegister)
9079{
9080 //
9081 // Check the arguments
9082 //
9083 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
9084 ASSERT((loadRegister > 0x0000U) && (loadRegister < 0x0800U));
9085
9086 //
9087 // The register specified by loadRegister is loaded by individual
9088 // register configuration setting
9089 //
9090
9091 HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_GLDCFG) &= ~loadRegister;
9092
9093}
9094//*****************************************************************************
9095//
9100//
9101//*****************************************************************************
9102static inline void
9103EPWM_lockRegisters(uint32_t base, EPWM_LockRegisterGroup registerGroup)
9104{
9105 //
9106 // Check the arguments
9107 //
9108 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
9109
9110 //
9111 // Write the Key to EPWMLOCK register
9112 //
9113 HWREG(base + EPWM_O_LOCK) =
9114 (0xA5A50000UL | ((uint32_t)registerGroup));
9115}
9116//
9117// XCMP related APIs
9118//
9119//*****************************************************************************
9120//
9128//
9129//*****************************************************************************
9130static inline void
9131EPWM_enableXCMPMode(uint32_t base)
9132{
9133 //
9134 // Check the arguments
9135 //
9136 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
9137 uint32_t registerOffset;
9138 registerOffset = base + EPWM_O_XCMP;
9139
9140 //
9141 // Enable XCMP compare register operation
9142 //
9143 HWREGH(registerOffset + EPWM_O_XCMPCTL1) |= EPWM_XCMPCTL1_XCMPEN;
9144}
9145//*****************************************************************************
9146//
9154//
9155//*****************************************************************************
9156static inline void
9157EPWM_disableXCMPMode(uint32_t base)
9158{
9159 //
9160 // Check the arguments
9161 //
9162 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
9163 uint32_t registerOffset;
9164 registerOffset = base + EPWM_O_XCMP;
9165
9166 //
9167 // Disable XCMP compare register operation
9168 //
9169 HWREGH(registerOffset + EPWM_O_XCMPCTL1) &= ~EPWM_XCMPCTL1_XCMPEN;
9170}
9171//*****************************************************************************
9172//
9180//
9181//*****************************************************************************
9182static inline void
9183EPWM_enableSplitXCMP(uint32_t base)
9184{
9185 //
9186 // Check the arguments
9187 //
9188 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
9189 uint32_t registerOffset;
9190 registerOffset = base + EPWM_O_XCMP;
9191
9192 HWREGH(registerOffset + EPWM_O_XCMPCTL1) |= EPWM_XCMPCTL1_XCMPSPLIT;
9193}
9194//*****************************************************************************
9195//
9203//
9204//*****************************************************************************
9205static inline void
9206EPWM_disableSplitXCMP(uint32_t base)
9207{
9208 //
9209 // Check the arguments
9210 //
9211 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
9212 uint32_t registerOffset;
9213 registerOffset = base + EPWM_O_XCMP;
9214
9215 HWREGH(registerOffset + EPWM_O_XCMPCTL1) &= ~EPWM_XCMPCTL1_XCMPSPLIT;
9216}
9217//*****************************************************************************
9218//
9236//
9237//*****************************************************************************
9238static inline void
9239EPWM_allocAXCMP(uint32_t base, EPWM_XCMP_ALLOC_CMPA alloctype)
9240{
9241 //
9242 // Check the arguments
9243 //
9244 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
9245 uint32_t registerOffset;
9246 registerOffset = base + EPWM_O_XCMP + EPWM_O_XCMPCTL1;
9247
9248 HWREGH(registerOffset ) =
9249 (HWREGH(registerOffset) & ~EPWM_XCMPCTL1_XCMPA_ALLOC_M) |
9250 ((uint32_t)alloctype << EPWM_XCMPCTL1_XCMPA_ALLOC_S);
9251}
9252//*****************************************************************************
9253//
9266//
9267//*****************************************************************************
9268static inline void
9269EPWM_allocBXCMP(uint32_t base, EPWM_XCMP_ALLOC_CMPB alloctype)
9270{
9271 //
9272 // Check the arguments
9273 //
9274 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
9275 uint32_t registerOffset;
9276 registerOffset = base + EPWM_O_XCMP + EPWM_O_XCMPCTL1;
9277
9278 HWREGH(registerOffset) =
9279 (HWREGH(registerOffset) & ~EPWM_XCMPCTL1_XCMPB_ALLOC_M) |
9280 ((uint32_t)alloctype << EPWM_XCMPCTL1_XCMPB_ALLOC_S);
9281}
9282//*****************************************************************************
9283//
9298//
9299//*****************************************************************************
9300static inline void
9301EPWM_setXCMPRegValue(uint32_t base, EPWM_XCMPReg xcmpReg,
9302 uint32_t xcmpvalue)
9303{
9304 //
9305 // Check the arguments
9306 //
9307 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
9308 uint32_t registerOffset;
9309 registerOffset = base + EPWM_O_XCMP +
9310 EPWM_O_XCMP1_ACTIVE + (uint32_t)xcmpReg * 2U;
9311
9312 //
9313 // Write to the XCMP registers.
9314 //
9315 HWREGH(registerOffset + 2U) = xcmpvalue;
9316}
9317//*****************************************************************************
9318//
9333//
9334//*****************************************************************************
9335static inline void
9336EPWM_setCMPShadowRegValue(uint32_t base, EPWM_XCompareReg cmpReg,
9337 uint32_t cmpvalue)
9338{
9339 //
9340 // Check the arguments
9341 //
9342 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
9343 uint32_t registerOffset;
9344 registerOffset = base + EPWM_O_XCMP + EPWM_O_CMPC_SHDW1 + (uint32_t)cmpReg * 2U;
9345
9346 //
9347 // Write to the CMPC/D Shadow registers.
9348 //
9349 HWREGH(registerOffset) = cmpvalue;
9350}
9351//*****************************************************************************
9352//
9369//
9370//*****************************************************************************
9371static inline void
9372EPWM_setXMINMAXRegValue(uint32_t base, EPWM_XMinMaxReg xminmaxReg,
9373 uint32_t xcmpvalue)
9374{
9375 //
9376 // Check the arguments
9377 //
9378 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
9379 uint32_t registerOffset;
9380 registerOffset = base + EPWM_O_XCMP +
9381 EPWM_O_XMINMAX_ACTIVE + (uint32_t)xminmaxReg * 2U;
9382
9383 //
9384 // Write to the XMINMAX register.
9385 //
9386 HWREGH(registerOffset) = xcmpvalue;
9387}
9388//*****************************************************************************
9389//
9425//
9426//*****************************************************************************
9427static inline void
9428EPWM_setXCMPActionQualifierAction(uint32_t base, uint32_t shadowset,
9429 EPWM_ActionQualifierOutputModule epwmOutput,
9430 EPWM_ActionQualifierOutput output,
9431 EPWM_XCMPActionQualifierOutputEvent event)
9432{
9433 //
9434 // Check the arguments
9435 //
9436 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
9437 uint32_t registerOffset;
9438
9439 //
9440 // Get the register offset
9441 //
9442
9443 if(shadowset == EPWM_XCMP_ACTIVE)
9444 {
9445 registerOffset = EPWM_O_XCMP + EPWM_O_XAQCTLA_ACTIVE +
9446 (uint32_t)(epwmOutput);
9447
9448 HWREGH(base + registerOffset) =
9449 (HWREGH(base + registerOffset) & ~(3UL << (uint32_t)event)) |
9450 ((uint32_t)output << (uint32_t)event);
9451 }
9452 else if(shadowset == EPWM_XCMP_SHADOW1)
9453 {
9454 registerOffset = EPWM_O_XCMP + EPWM_O_XAQCTLA_SHDW1 +
9455 (uint32_t)(epwmOutput);
9456
9457 HWREGH(base + registerOffset) =
9458 (HWREGH(base + registerOffset) & ~(3UL << (uint32_t)event)) |
9459 ((uint32_t)output << (uint32_t)event);
9460 }
9461 else if(shadowset == EPWM_XCMP_SHADOW2)
9462 {
9463 registerOffset = EPWM_O_XCMP + EPWM_O_XAQCTLA_SHDW2 +
9464 (uint32_t)(epwmOutput);
9465
9466 HWREGH(base + registerOffset) =
9467 (HWREGH(base + registerOffset) & ~(3UL << (uint32_t)event)) |
9468 ((uint32_t)output << (uint32_t)event);
9469 }
9470 else if(shadowset == EPWM_XCMP_SHADOW3)
9471 {
9472 registerOffset = EPWM_O_XCMP + EPWM_O_XAQCTLA_SHDW3 +
9473 (uint32_t)(epwmOutput);
9474
9475 HWREGH(base + registerOffset) =
9476 (HWREGH(base + registerOffset) & ~(3UL << (uint32_t)event)) |
9477 ((uint32_t)output << (uint32_t)event);
9478 }
9479 else
9480 {
9481 // Do nothing. Not a valid case.
9482 }
9483}
9484
9485//*****************************************************************************
9486//
9494//
9495//*****************************************************************************
9496static inline void
9497EPWM_enableXLoad(uint32_t base)
9498{
9499 //
9500 // Check the arguments
9501 //
9502 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
9503 uint32_t registerOffset;
9504 registerOffset = base + EPWM_O_XCMP;
9505
9506 HWREGH(registerOffset + EPWM_O_XLOAD) = EPWM_XLOAD_STARTLD;
9507}
9508//*****************************************************************************
9509//
9518//
9519//*****************************************************************************
9520static inline void
9521EPWM_forceXLoad(uint32_t base)
9522{
9523 //
9524 // Check the arguments
9525 //
9526 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
9527 uint32_t registerOffset;
9528 registerOffset = base + EPWM_O_XCMP;
9529
9530 HWREGH(registerOffset + EPWM_O_XLOAD) = EPWM_XLOAD_FRCLD;
9531}
9532//*****************************************************************************
9533//
9544//
9545//*****************************************************************************
9546static inline void
9547EPWM_setXCMPLoadMode(uint32_t base, EPWM_XCMPXloadCtlLoadMode mode)
9548{
9549 //
9550 // Check the arguments
9551 //
9552 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
9553 uint32_t registerOffset;
9554 registerOffset = base + EPWM_O_XCMP;
9555
9556 if(mode == EPWM_XCMP_XLOADCTL_LOADMODE_LOADONCE)
9557 {
9558 HWREGH(registerOffset + EPWM_O_XLOADCTL) &= ~EPWM_XLOADCTL_LOADMODE;
9559 }
9560 else if(mode == EPWM_XCMP_XLOADCTL_LOADMODE_LOADMULTIPLE)
9561 {
9562 HWREGH(registerOffset + EPWM_O_XLOADCTL) |= EPWM_XLOADCTL_LOADMODE;
9563 }
9564 else
9565 {
9566 // Do nothing. Not a valid case.
9567 }
9568}
9569//*****************************************************************************
9570//
9583//
9584//*****************************************************************************
9585static inline void
9586EPWM_setXCMPShadowLevel(uint32_t base, EPWM_XCMP_XLOADCTL_SHDWLEVEL level)
9587{
9588 //
9589 // Check the arguments
9590 //
9591 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
9592 uint32_t registerOffset;
9593 registerOffset = base + EPWM_O_XCMP + EPWM_O_XLOADCTL;
9594
9595 HWREGH(registerOffset) =
9596 (HWREGH(registerOffset) & ~EPWM_XLOADCTL_SHDWLEVEL_M) |
9597 ((uint32_t)level << EPWM_XLOADCTL_SHDWLEVEL_S);
9598}
9599//*****************************************************************************
9600//
9613//
9614//*****************************************************************************
9615static inline void
9616EPWM_setXCMPShadowBufPtrLoadOnce(uint32_t base,
9617 EPWM_XCMP_XLOADCTL_SHDWBUFPTR ptr)
9618{
9619 //
9620 // Check the arguments
9621 //
9622 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
9623 uint32_t registerOffset;
9624 registerOffset = base + EPWM_O_XCMP + EPWM_O_XLOADCTL;
9625
9626 HWREGH(registerOffset) =
9627 (HWREGH(registerOffset) & ~EPWM_XLOADCTL_SHDWBUFPTR_LOADONCE_M) |
9628 ((uint32_t)ptr << EPWM_XLOADCTL_SHDWBUFPTR_LOADONCE_S);
9629}
9630//*****************************************************************************
9631//
9647//
9648//*****************************************************************************
9649static inline void
9650EPWM_setXCMPShadowRepeatBufxCount(uint32_t base, uint32_t bufferset,
9651 uint32_t count)
9652{
9653 //
9654 // Check the arguments
9655 //
9656 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
9657 ASSERT(count < 8U);
9658 uint32_t registerOffset;
9659 registerOffset = base + EPWM_O_XCMP + EPWM_O_XLOADCTL;
9660
9661 if(bufferset == EPWM_XCMP_SHADOW2)
9662 {
9663 HWREG(registerOffset) =
9664 (HWREG(registerOffset) & ~EPWM_XLOADCTL_RPTBUF2PRD_M) |
9665 ((uint32_t)count << EPWM_XLOADCTL_RPTBUF2PRD_S);
9666 }
9667 else if(bufferset == EPWM_XCMP_SHADOW3)
9668 {
9669 HWREG(registerOffset) =
9670 (HWREG(registerOffset) & ~EPWM_XLOADCTL_RPTBUF3PRD_M) |
9671 ((uint32_t)count << EPWM_XLOADCTL_RPTBUF3PRD_S);
9672 }
9673 else
9674 {
9675 // Do nothing. Not a valid case.
9676 }
9677}
9678//
9679// Minimum Dead Band Module related APIs
9680//
9681//*****************************************************************************
9682//
9696//
9697//*****************************************************************************
9698static inline void
9699EPWM_enableMinimumDeadBand(uint32_t base, uint32_t block)
9700{
9701 //
9702 // Check the arguments
9703 //
9704 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
9705 uint32_t registerOffset;
9706 registerOffset = base + EPWM_O_MINDB + EPWM_O_MINDBCFG;
9707
9708 //
9709 // Set the appropriate block to enable minimum dead band logic.
9710 //
9711 if(block == EPWM_MINDB_BLOCK_A)
9712 {
9713 HWREG(registerOffset) |= EPWM_MINDBCFG_ENABLEA;
9714 }
9715 else
9716 {
9717 HWREG(registerOffset) |= EPWM_MINDBCFG_ENABLEB;
9718 }
9719}
9720//*****************************************************************************
9721//
9735//
9736//*****************************************************************************
9737static inline void
9738EPWM_disableMinimumDeadBand(uint32_t base, uint32_t block)
9739{
9740 //
9741 // Check the arguments
9742 //
9743 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
9744 uint32_t registerOffset;
9745 registerOffset = base + EPWM_O_MINDB;
9746
9747 //
9748 // Set the appropriate block to disable minimum dead band logic.
9749 //
9750 if(block == EPWM_MINDB_BLOCK_A)
9751 {
9752 HWREG(registerOffset) &= ~EPWM_MINDBCFG_ENABLEA;
9753 }
9754 else
9755 {
9756 HWREG(registerOffset) &= ~EPWM_MINDBCFG_ENABLEB;
9757 }
9758}
9759//*****************************************************************************
9760//
9778//
9779//*****************************************************************************
9780static inline void
9781EPWM_invertMinimumDeadBandSignal(uint32_t base, uint32_t block,
9782 uint32_t invert)
9783{
9784 //
9785 // Check the arguments
9786 //
9787 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
9788 uint32_t registerOffset;
9789 registerOffset = base + EPWM_O_MINDB + EPWM_O_MINDBCFG;
9790
9791 //
9792 // Set the appropriate output bit to enable minimum dead band logic.
9793 //
9794 if(block == EPWM_MINDB_BLOCK_A)
9795 {
9796 HWREGH(registerOffset) =
9797 (HWREGH(registerOffset) & ~EPWM_MINDBCFG_INVERTA) |
9798 (invert << 2U);
9799 }
9800 else
9801 {
9802 HWREG(registerOffset) =
9803 (HWREG(registerOffset) & ~EPWM_MINDBCFG_INVERTB) |
9804 (invert << 18U);
9805 }
9806}
9807//*****************************************************************************
9808//
9827//
9828//*****************************************************************************
9829static inline void
9830EPWM_selectMinimumDeadBandAndOrLogic(uint32_t base, uint32_t block,
9831 uint32_t logic)
9832{
9833 //
9834 // Check the arguments
9835 //
9836 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
9837 uint32_t registerOffset;
9838 registerOffset = base + EPWM_O_MINDB + EPWM_O_MINDBCFG;
9839
9840 if(block == EPWM_MINDB_BLOCK_A)
9841 {
9842 //
9843 // Configure logic operation on EPWMA
9844 //
9845 HWREGH(registerOffset) =
9846 (HWREGH(registerOffset) & ~EPWM_MINDBCFG_POLSELA) |
9847 ((uint32_t)logic << 8U);
9848 }
9849 else
9850 {
9851 //
9852 // Configure logic operation on EPWMB
9853 //
9854 HWREG(registerOffset) =
9855 (HWREG(registerOffset) & ~EPWM_MINDBCFG_POLSELB) |
9856 ((uint32_t)logic << 24U);
9857 }
9858}
9859//*****************************************************************************
9860//
9878//
9879//*****************************************************************************
9880static inline void
9881EPWM_selectMinimumDeadBandBlockingSignal(uint32_t base, uint32_t block,
9882 uint32_t blockingSignal)
9883{
9884 //
9885 // Check the arguments
9886 //
9887 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
9888 uint32_t registerOffset;
9889 registerOffset = base + EPWM_O_MINDB + EPWM_O_MINDBCFG;
9890
9891 if(block == EPWM_MINDB_BLOCK_A)
9892 {
9893 //
9894 // Configure block signal source on EPWMA
9895 //
9896 HWREGH(registerOffset) =
9897 (HWREGH(registerOffset) & ~EPWM_MINDBCFG_SELBLOCKA) |
9898 ((uint32_t)blockingSignal << 3U);
9899 }
9900 else
9901 {
9902 //
9903 // Configure block signal source on EPWMB
9904 //
9905 HWREG(registerOffset) =
9906 (HWREG(registerOffset) & ~EPWM_MINDBCFG_SELBLOCKB) |
9907 ((uint32_t)blockingSignal << 19U);
9908 }
9909}
9910//*****************************************************************************
9911//
9930//
9931//*****************************************************************************
9932static inline void
9933EPWM_selectMinimumDeadBandReferenceSignal(uint32_t base, uint32_t block,
9934 uint32_t referenceSignal)
9935{
9936 //
9937 // Check the arguments
9938 //
9939 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
9940 uint32_t registerOffset;
9941 registerOffset = base + EPWM_O_MINDB + EPWM_O_MINDBCFG;
9942
9943 if(block == EPWM_MINDB_BLOCK_A)
9944 {
9945 //
9946 // Select reference source for minimum dead band on EPWMA
9947 //
9948 HWREGH(registerOffset) =
9949 (HWREGH(registerOffset) & ~EPWM_MINDBCFG_SELA_M) |
9950 ((uint32_t)referenceSignal << EPWM_MINDBCFG_SELA_S);
9951 }
9952 else
9953 {
9954 //
9955 // Select reference source for minimum dead band on EPWMB
9956 //
9957 HWREG(registerOffset) =
9958 (HWREG(registerOffset) & ~EPWM_MINDBCFG_SELB_M) |
9959 ((uint32_t)referenceSignal << EPWM_MINDBCFG_SELB_S);
9960 }
9961}
9962//*****************************************************************************
9963//
9976//
9977//*****************************************************************************
9978static inline uint32_t
9979EPWM_getMinDeadBandDelay(uint32_t base, uint32_t block)
9980{
9981 //
9982 // Check the arguments
9983 //
9984 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
9985 uint32_t retval;
9986 uint32_t registerOffset;
9987 registerOffset = base + EPWM_O_MINDB + EPWM_O_MINDBDLY;
9988
9989 if(block == EPWM_MINDB_BLOCK_A)
9990 {
9991 //
9992 // Return dead band delay value of ePWMA
9993 //
9994 retval = ((uint32_t)HWREGH(registerOffset) & EPWM_MINDBDLY_DELAYA_M);
9995 }
9996 else
9997 {
9998 //
9999 // Return dead band delay value of ePWMB
10000 //
10001 retval = (HWREG(registerOffset) &
10002 EPWM_MINDBDLY_DELAYB_M);
10003 }
10004
10005 return(retval);
10006}
10007//*****************************************************************************
10008//
10024//
10025//*****************************************************************************
10026static inline void
10027EPWM_setMinDeadBandDelay(uint32_t base, uint32_t block, uint32_t delay)
10028{
10029 //
10030 // Check the arguments
10031 //
10032 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
10033 uint32_t registerOffset;
10034 registerOffset = base + EPWM_O_MINDB + EPWM_O_MINDBDLY;
10035
10036 if(block == EPWM_MINDB_BLOCK_A)
10037 {
10038 //
10039 // Dead band delay for ePWMA
10040 //
10041 HWREGH(registerOffset) = (uint16_t)delay;
10042 }
10043 else
10044 {
10045 //
10046 // Dead band delay for ePWMB
10047 //
10048 HWREGH(registerOffset + 2U) = (uint16_t)delay;
10049 }
10050}
10051
10052//
10053// Illegal Combo Logic
10054//
10055//*****************************************************************************
10056//
10069//
10070//*****************************************************************************
10071static inline void
10072EPWM_enableIllegalComboLogic(uint32_t base, uint32_t block)
10073{
10074 //
10075 // Check the arguments
10076 //
10077 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
10078 uint32_t registerOffset;
10079 registerOffset = base + EPWM_O_MINDB;
10080
10081 if(block == EPWM_MINDB_BLOCK_A)
10082 {
10083 //
10084 // Enable LUTA
10085 //
10086 HWREGH(registerOffset + EPWM_O_LUTCTLA) =
10087 (HWREGH(registerOffset + EPWM_O_LUTCTLA) &
10088 ~EPWM_LUTCTLA_BYPASS);
10089 }
10090 else
10091 {
10092 //
10093 // Enable LUTB
10094 //
10095 HWREGH(registerOffset + EPWM_O_LUTCTLB) =
10096 (HWREGH(registerOffset + EPWM_O_LUTCTLB) &
10097 ~EPWM_LUTCTLB_BYPASS);
10098 }
10099}
10100//*****************************************************************************
10101//
10114//
10115//*****************************************************************************
10116static inline void
10117EPWM_disableIllegalComboLogic(uint32_t base, uint32_t block)
10118{
10119 //
10120 // Check the arguments
10121 //
10122 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
10123 uint32_t registerOffset;
10124 registerOffset = base + EPWM_O_MINDB;
10125
10126 if(block == EPWM_MINDB_BLOCK_A)
10127 {
10128 //
10129 // Bypass LUTA
10130 //
10131 HWREGH(registerOffset + EPWM_O_LUTCTLA) =
10132 (HWREGH(registerOffset + EPWM_O_LUTCTLA) |
10133 EPWM_LUTCTLA_BYPASS);
10134 }
10135 else
10136 {
10137 //
10138 // Bypass LUTB
10139 //
10140 HWREGH(registerOffset + EPWM_O_LUTCTLB) =
10141 (HWREGH(registerOffset + EPWM_O_LUTCTLB) |
10142 EPWM_LUTCTLB_BYPASS);
10143 }
10144}
10145//*****************************************************************************
10146//
10164//
10165//*****************************************************************************
10166static inline void
10167EPWM_selectXbarInput(uint32_t base, uint32_t block, uint32_t xbarInput)
10168{
10169 //
10170 // Check the arguments
10171 //
10172 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
10173 uint32_t registerOffset;
10174 registerOffset = base + EPWM_O_MINDB;
10175
10176 if(block == EPWM_MINDB_BLOCK_A)
10177 {
10178 //
10179 // Select one of the 16 outputs of ICL XBAR for ePWMA
10180 //
10181 HWREGH(registerOffset + EPWM_O_LUTCTLA) =
10182 (HWREGH(registerOffset + EPWM_O_LUTCTLA) & ~EPWM_LUTCTLA_SELXBAR_M) |
10183 ((uint32_t)xbarInput << EPWM_LUTCTLA_SELXBAR_S);
10184 }
10185 else
10186 {
10187 //
10188 // Select one of the 16 outputs of ICL XBAR for ePWMB
10189 //
10190 HWREGH(registerOffset + EPWM_O_LUTCTLB) =
10191 (HWREGH(registerOffset + EPWM_O_LUTCTLB) & ~EPWM_LUTCTLB_SELXBAR_M) |
10192 ((uint32_t)xbarInput << EPWM_LUTCTLB_SELXBAR_S);
10193 }
10194}
10195//*****************************************************************************
10196//
10216//
10217//*****************************************************************************
10218static inline void
10219EPWM_setLutDecX(uint32_t base, uint32_t block, uint32_t decx, uint32_t force)
10220{
10221 //
10222 // Check the arguments
10223 //
10224 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
10225 uint32_t registerOffset;
10226 registerOffset = base + EPWM_O_MINDB;
10227
10228 if(block == EPWM_MINDB_BLOCK_A)
10229 {
10230 //
10231 // Forces either 0 or 1 in the LUTDECx bit of LUTCTLA register
10232 //
10233 HWREGH(registerOffset + EPWM_O_LUTCTLA + 2U) =
10234 ((HWREGH(registerOffset + EPWM_O_LUTCTLA + 2U) & ~(1U << decx)) |
10235 (force << decx));
10236 }
10237 else
10238 {
10239 //
10240 // Forces either 0 or 1 in the LUTDECx bit of LUTCTLB register
10241 //
10242 HWREGH(registerOffset + EPWM_O_LUTCTLB + 2U) =
10243 ((HWREGH(registerOffset + EPWM_O_LUTCTLB + 2U) & ~(1U << decx)) |
10244 (force << decx));
10245 }
10246}
10247//
10248// Diode Emulation logic related APIs
10249//
10250//*****************************************************************************
10251//
10259//
10260//*****************************************************************************
10261
10262static inline void
10263EPWM_enableDiodeEmulationMode(uint32_t base)
10264{
10265 //
10266 // Check the arguments
10267 //
10268 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
10269 uint32_t registerOffset;
10270 registerOffset = base + EPWM_O_DE;
10271
10272 //
10273 // Enable DE function
10274 //
10275 HWREGH(registerOffset + EPWM_O_DECTL) = EPWM_DECTL_ENABLE;
10276
10277}
10278//*****************************************************************************
10279//
10287//
10288//*****************************************************************************
10289static inline void
10290EPWM_disableDiodeEmulationMode(uint32_t base)
10291{
10292 //
10293 // Check the arguments
10294 //
10295 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
10296 uint32_t registerOffset;
10297 registerOffset = base + EPWM_O_DE;
10298
10299 //
10300 // Disable DE function
10301 //
10302 HWREGH(registerOffset + EPWM_O_DECTL) &= ~EPWM_DECTL_ENABLE;
10303
10304}
10305//*****************************************************************************
10306//
10311
10318//
10319//*****************************************************************************
10320static inline void
10321EPWM_setDiodeEmulationMode(uint32_t base, EPWM_DiodeEmulationMode mode)
10322{
10323 //
10324 // Check the arguments
10325 //
10326 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
10327 uint32_t registerOffset;
10328 registerOffset = base + EPWM_O_DE;
10329
10330 if(mode == EPWM_DIODE_EMULATION_CBC)
10331 {
10332 //
10333 // Enable DE CBC mode
10334 //
10335 HWREGH(registerOffset + EPWM_O_DECTL) &= ~EPWM_DECTL_MODE;
10336 }
10337 else if(mode == EPWM_DIODE_EMULATION_OST)
10338 {
10339 //
10340 // Enable DE OST mode
10341 //
10342 HWREGH(registerOffset + EPWM_O_DECTL) |= EPWM_DECTL_MODE;
10343 }
10344 else
10345 {
10346 // Do nothing. Not a valid case.
10347 }
10348}
10349//*****************************************************************************
10350//
10363//
10364//*****************************************************************************
10365static inline void
10366EPWM_setDiodeEmulationReentryDelay(uint32_t base, uint32_t delay)
10367{
10368 //
10369 // Check the arguments
10370 //
10371 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
10372 ASSERT(delay <= 256U);
10373 uint32_t registerOffset;
10374 registerOffset = base + EPWM_O_DE;
10375
10376 HWREGH(registerOffset + EPWM_O_DECTL) =
10377 (HWREGH(registerOffset + EPWM_O_DECTL) & ~EPWM_DECTL_REENTRYDLY_M) |
10378 (delay << EPWM_DECTL_REENTRYDLY_S);
10379}
10380//*****************************************************************************
10381//
10394//*****************************************************************************
10395static inline void
10396EPWM_configureDiodeEmulationTripLowSources(uint32_t base,
10397 EPWM_DiodeEmulationTripLSource source)
10398{
10399 //
10400 // Check the arguments
10401 //
10402 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
10403 uint32_t registerOffset;
10404 registerOffset = base + EPWM_O_DE + EPWM_O_DECOMPSEL;
10405
10406
10407 HWREGH(registerOffset) =
10408 (HWREGH(registerOffset) & ~EPWM_DECOMPSEL_TRIPL_M) |
10409 ((uint32_t)source << EPWM_DECOMPSEL_TRIPL_S);
10410
10411}
10412//*****************************************************************************
10413//
10426//*****************************************************************************
10427static inline void
10428EPWM_configureDiodeEmulationTripHighSources(uint32_t base,
10429 EPWM_DiodeEmulationTripHSource source)
10430{
10431 //
10432 // Check the arguments
10433 //
10434 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
10435 uint32_t registerOffset;
10436 registerOffset = base + EPWM_O_DE + EPWM_O_DECOMPSEL;
10437
10438 HWREG(registerOffset) =
10439 (HWREG(registerOffset) & ~EPWM_DECOMPSEL_TRIPH_M) |
10440 ((uint32_t)source << EPWM_DECOMPSEL_TRIPH_S);
10441
10442
10443}
10444//*****************************************************************************
10445//
10464//*****************************************************************************
10465static inline void
10466EPWM_selectDiodeEmulationPWMsignal(uint32_t base, uint32_t channel,
10467 EPWM_DiodeEmulationSignal DEsignal)
10468{
10469 //
10470 // Check the arguments
10471 //
10472 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
10473 uint32_t registerOffset;
10474 registerOffset = base + EPWM_O_DE + EPWM_O_DEACTCTL;
10475
10476 if(channel == EPWM_DE_CHANNEL_A)
10477 {
10478 HWREGH(registerOffset) =
10479 (HWREGH(registerOffset) & ~EPWM_DEACTCTL_PWMA_M) |
10480 ((uint32_t)DEsignal << EPWM_DEACTCTL_PWMA_S);
10481 }
10482 else
10483 {
10484 HWREGH(registerOffset) =
10485 (HWREGH(registerOffset) & ~EPWM_DEACTCTL_PWMB_M) |
10486 ((uint32_t)DEsignal << EPWM_DEACTCTL_PWMB_S);
10487 }
10488}
10489//*****************************************************************************
10490//
10506//*****************************************************************************
10507static inline void
10508EPWM_selectDiodeEmulationTripSignal(uint32_t base, uint32_t channel,
10509 uint32_t DEsignal)
10510{
10511 //
10512 // Check the arguments
10513 //
10514 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
10515 uint32_t registerOffset;
10516 registerOffset = base + EPWM_O_DE + EPWM_O_DEACTCTL;
10517
10518 if(channel == EPWM_DE_CHANNEL_A)
10519 {
10520 HWREGH(registerOffset) =
10521 (HWREGH(registerOffset) & ~EPWM_DEACTCTL_TRIPSELA) |
10522 (DEsignal << 2U);
10523 }
10524 else
10525 {
10526 HWREGH(registerOffset) =
10527 (HWREGH(registerOffset) & ~EPWM_DEACTCTL_TRIPSELB) |
10528 (DEsignal << 6U);
10529 }
10530}
10531//*****************************************************************************
10532//
10539//*****************************************************************************
10540static inline void
10541EPWM_nobypassDiodeEmulationLogic(uint32_t base)
10542{
10543 //
10544 // Check the arguments
10545 //
10546 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
10547 uint32_t registerOffset;
10548 registerOffset = base + EPWM_O_DE;
10549
10550 HWREG(registerOffset + EPWM_O_DEACTCTL) &= ~EPWM_DEACTCTL_TRIPENABLE;
10551
10552}
10553//*****************************************************************************
10554//
10561//*****************************************************************************
10562static inline void
10563EPWM_bypassDiodeEmulationLogic(uint32_t base)
10564{
10565 //
10566 // Check the arguments
10567 //
10568 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
10569 uint32_t registerOffset;
10570 registerOffset = base + EPWM_O_DE;
10571
10572 HWREG(registerOffset + EPWM_O_DEACTCTL) |= EPWM_DEACTCTL_TRIPENABLE;
10573
10574}
10575//*****************************************************************************
10576//
10583//*****************************************************************************
10584static inline void
10585EPWM_forceDiodeEmulationActive(uint32_t base)
10586{
10587 //
10588 // Check the arguments
10589 //
10590 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
10591 uint32_t registerOffset;
10592 registerOffset = base + EPWM_O_DE;
10593
10594 HWREGH(registerOffset + EPWM_O_DEFRC) |= EPWM_DEFRC_DEACTIVE;
10595}
10596//*****************************************************************************
10597//
10604//*****************************************************************************
10605static inline void
10606EPWM_enableDiodeEmulationMonitorModeControl(uint32_t base)
10607{
10608 //
10609 // Check the arguments
10610 //
10611 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
10612 uint32_t registerOffset;
10613 registerOffset = base + EPWM_O_DE;
10614
10615 HWREGH(registerOffset + EPWM_O_DEMONCTL) |= EPWM_DEMONCTL_ENABLE;
10616
10617}
10618//*****************************************************************************
10619//
10626//*****************************************************************************
10627static inline void
10628EPWM_disableDiodeEmulationMonitorModeControl(uint32_t base)
10629{
10630 //
10631 // Check the arguments
10632 //
10633 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
10634 uint32_t registerOffset;
10635 registerOffset = base + EPWM_O_DE;
10636
10637 HWREGH(registerOffset + EPWM_O_DEMONCTL) &= ~EPWM_DEMONCTL_ENABLE;
10638}
10639//*****************************************************************************
10640//
10656//*****************************************************************************
10657static inline void
10658EPWM_setDiodeEmulationMonitorModeStep(uint32_t base, uint32_t direction,
10659 uint32_t stepsize)
10660{
10661 //
10662 // Check the arguments
10663 //
10664 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
10665 ASSERT(stepsize <= 256U);
10666 uint32_t registerOffset;
10667 registerOffset = base + EPWM_O_DE + EPWM_O_DEMONSTEP;
10668
10669 if(direction == EPWM_DE_COUNT_UP)
10670 {
10671 HWREGH(registerOffset) =
10672 (HWREGH(registerOffset) & ~EPWM_DEMONSTEP_INCSTEP_M) |
10673 (stepsize << EPWM_DEMONSTEP_INCSTEP_S);
10674 }
10675 else if(direction == EPWM_DE_COUNT_DOWN)
10676 {
10677 HWREG(registerOffset) =
10678 (HWREG(registerOffset) & ~EPWM_DEMONSTEP_DECSTEP_M) |
10679 (stepsize << EPWM_DEMONSTEP_DECSTEP_S);
10680 }
10681 else
10682 {
10683 // Do nothing. Not a valid case.
10684 }
10685}
10686//*****************************************************************************
10687//
10696//*****************************************************************************
10697static inline void
10698EPWM_setDiodeEmulationMonitorCounterThreshold(uint32_t base,
10699 uint32_t threshold)
10700{
10701 //
10702 // Check the arguments
10703 //
10704 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
10705 ASSERT(threshold <= 0xFFFFUL);
10706 uint32_t registerOffset;
10707 registerOffset = base + EPWM_O_DE + EPWM_O_DEMONTHRES;
10708
10709 HWREGH(registerOffset) = (uint16_t)threshold;
10710}
10711//*****************************************************************************
10712//
10719//*****************************************************************************
10720static inline void
10721EPWM_clearDiodeEmulationActiveFlag(uint32_t base)
10722{
10723 //
10724 // Check the arguments
10725 //
10726 ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
10727 uint32_t registerOffset;
10728 registerOffset = base + EPWM_O_DE;
10729
10730 HWREGH(registerOffset + EPWM_O_DECLR) |= EPWM_DECLR_DEACTIVE;
10731}
10732//*****************************************************************************
10733//
10748//
10749//*****************************************************************************
10750extern void
10751EPWM_setEmulationMode(uint32_t base, EPWM_EmulationMode emulationMode);
10752
10753//*****************************************************************************
10754//
10764//
10765//*****************************************************************************
10766extern void
10767EPWM_configureSignal(uint32_t base, const EPWM_SignalParams *signalParams);
10768
10769//*****************************************************************************
10770//
10771// Close the Doxygen group.
10773//
10774//*****************************************************************************
10775
10776//*****************************************************************************
10777//
10778// Mark the end of the C bindings section for C++ compilers.
10779//
10780//*****************************************************************************
10781#ifdef __cplusplus
10782}
10783#endif
10784
10785#endif // EPWM_H
